 849  8B62                  include "./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
   1+ 8B62              ScaleXX16Matrix197:
   2+ 8B62 06 09        	ld		b,9                 ; Interate though all 9 matrix elements
   3+ 8B64 0E C5        	ld		c,ConstNorm         ; c = 197
   4+ 8B66 21 33 C0     	ld		hl,UBnkTransmatSidev ; within XX16 (transmat)
   5+ 8B69              .ScaleXX16Loop:
   6+ 8B69 7E           	ld		a,(hl)              ; set DE = matrix value
   7+ 8B6A 5F           	ld		e,a                 ;
   8+ 8B6B 23           	inc		hl                  ;
   9+ 8B6C 7E           	ld		a,(hl)              ;
  10+ 8B6D 57           	ld		d,a                 ;
  11+ 8B6E E6 80            and     SignOnly8Bit        ; A holds high still to we can strip out sign bit
  12+ 8B70 DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a				; retain for sign bit
  13+ 8B72              	ShiftDELeft1				; carry now holds sign bit and DE = De * 2, this will in effect strip off the sign bit automatically
  13+ 8B72 CB 23       >			   sla e
  13+ 8B74 CB 12       >			   rl  d
  14+ 8B76 7A               ld      a,d                 ; a = high byte after x 2
  15+ 8B77 C5           	push	bc                  ; save BC  counter and constant 197
  16+ 8B78 E5           	push	hl                  ; save HL
  17+ 8B79 CD 0C A3     	call	DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	; result in BC = A*256 / 197 or D *512 / 197 = 2.6 * vector element, effectivley the result will always be in c
  18+ 8B7C E1           	pop		hl
  19+ 8B7D 2B               dec     hl                  ; move back to low byte
  20+ 8B7E 71               ld      (hl),c              ; save result in low byte as we want to preserve high byte sign
  21+ 8B7F 23               inc     hl                  ; move back to high byte
  22+ 8B80              ;    ld      a,(hl)
  23+ 8B80              ;    and     $80
  24+ 8B80 DD 7D            ld      a,ixl
  25+ 8B82 77               ld      (hl),a              ; write back just sign bit
  26+ 8B83 C1           	pop		bc                  ; retrieve both counter and constant 197
  27+ 8B84 23               inc     hl                  ; no to next vertex value
  28+ 8B85 10 E2        	djnz	.ScaleXX16Loop
  29+ 8B87 C9           	ret
  30+ 8B88
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/ScaleXX16Matrix197.asm
 850  8B88
 851  8B88                  include "./Universe/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 8B88              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 8B88              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 8B88              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 8B88              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 8B88
   6+ 8B88              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 8B88              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 8B88
   9+ 8B88 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl
  10+ 8B89 CD C9 97                             call    doRND
  11+ 8B8C EB                                   ex      de,hl
  12+ 8B8D F6 08                                or      8
  13+ 8B8F 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  14+ 8B90 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  15+ 8B92 23                                   inc     hl
  16+ 8B93 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  17+ 8B94 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  18+ 8B95 CD C9 97                             call    doRND
  19+ 8B98 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  20+ 8B99 0F                                   rrca
  21+ 8B9A E6 80                                and     $80
  22+ 8B9C B6                                   or      (hl)
  23+ 8B9D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 8B9E 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 8B9F EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 8BA0 CD C9 97                             call    doRND
  27+ 8BA3 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 8BA4 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 8BA6 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 8BA7 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 8BA8 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 8BAA 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 8BAB EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 8BAC CD C9 97                             call    doRND
  35+ 8BAF EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 8BB0 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 8BB1 E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 8BB3 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 8BB4 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 8BB5 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 8BB6 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 8BB7 CD C9 97                             call    doRND
  43+ 8BBA EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 8BBB F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 8BBD 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 8BBE 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 8BBF F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 8BC1 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 8BC3 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 8BC4 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 8BC5 C9                                   ret
  52+ 8BC6
  53+ 8BC6 EB           InitHyperStarAtHL:      ex      de,hl
  54+ 8BC7 CD C9 97                             call    doRND
  55+ 8BCA CB 27                                sla     a
  56+ 8BCC CB 27                                sla     a                ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  57+ 8BCE EB                                   ex      de,hl
  58+ 8BCF E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  59+ 8BD1 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  60+ 8BD2 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  61+ 8BD4 23                                   inc     hl
  62+ 8BD5 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  63+ 8BD6 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  64+ 8BD7 CD C9 97                             call    doRND
  65+ 8BDA EB                                   ex      de,hl
  66+ 8BDB 0F                                   rrca
  67+ 8BDC E6 80                                and     $80
  68+ 8BDE B6                                   or      (hl)
  69+ 8BDF 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  70+ 8BE0 23                                   inc     hl
  71+ 8BE1 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  72+ 8BE2 CD C9 97                             call    doRND
  73+ 8BE5 CB 27                                sla     a
  74+ 8BE7 CB 27                                sla     a               ; so its * 4 as we have a blank spot
  75+ 8BE9 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  76+ 8BEA E6 F8                                and     %11111000
  77+ 8BEC 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  78+ 8BED 23                                   inc     hl
  79+ 8BEE E6 7F                                and     $7F
  80+ 8BF0 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  81+ 8BF1 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  82+ 8BF2 CD C9 97                             call    doRND
  83+ 8BF5 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  84+ 8BF6 0F                                   rrca
  85+ 8BF7 E6 80                                and     $80
  86+ 8BF9 B6                                   or      (hl)
  87+ 8BFA 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  88+ 8BFB 23                                   inc     hl
  89+ 8BFC EB                                   ex      de,hl
  90+ 8BFD CD C9 97                             call    doRND
  91+ 8C00 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  92+ 8C01 F6 5F                                or      95
  93+ 8C03 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  94+ 8C04 23                                   inc     hl
  95+ 8C05 F6 70                                or      %01110000
  96+ 8C07 E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  97+ 8C09 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  98+ 8C0A 23                                   inc     hl
  99+ 8C0B C9                                   ret
 100+ 8C0C
 101+ 8C0C              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 102+ 8C0C 7C           StarsSUBHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 103+ 8C0D E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 104+ 8C0F 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 105+ 8C10 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 106+ 8C11                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 106+ 8C11 FA 3F 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
 107+ 8C14 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 108+ 8C15 B2                                   or      d
 109+ 8C16                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 109+ 8C16 FA 20 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
 110+ 8C19 B7                                   or      a
 111+ 8C1A ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 112+ 8C1C                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 112+ 8C1C FA 33 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 113+ 8C1F C9                                   ret
 114+ 8C20 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 115+ 8C21 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 116+ 8C23 67                                   ld      h,a
 117+ 8C24 7A                                   ld      a,d
 118+ 8C25 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 119+ 8C27 57                                   ld      d,a
 120+ 8C28 B7                                   or      a
 121+ 8C29 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 122+ 8C2B                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 122+ 8C2B FA 33 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 123+ 8C2E 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 124+ 8C2F F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 125+ 8C31 67                                   ld      h,a
 126+ 8C32 C9                                   ret
 127+ 8C33              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
 127+ 8C33 AF          >                    xor a
 127+ 8C34 95          >                    sub l
 127+ 8C35 6F          >                    ld l,a
 127+ 8C36 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 127+ 8C37 94          >                    sub h
 127+ 8C38 67          >                    ld h,a
 128+ 8C39 78                                   ld      a,b
 129+ 8C3A EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 130+ 8C3C B4                                   or      h
 131+ 8C3D 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 132+ 8C3E C9                                   ret
 133+ 8C3F B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
 134+ 8C40 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 135+ 8C41 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 136+ 8C43 67                                   ld      h,a
 137+ 8C44 7A                                   ld      a,d
 138+ 8C45 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 139+ 8C47 57                                   ld      d,a
 140+ 8C48 19                                   add     hl,de
 141+ 8C49 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 142+ 8C4A B4                                   or      h
 143+ 8C4B 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 144+ 8C4C C9                                   ret
 145+ 8C4D
 146+ 8C4D 7C           StarsADDHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
 147+ 8C4E E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 148+ 8C50 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 149+ 8C51 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 150+ 8C52                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 150+ 8C52 FA 6A 8C    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 151+ 8C55 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 152+ 8C56 B2                                   or      d
 153+ 8C57                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 153+ 8C57 FA 5C 8C    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 154+ 8C5A 19                                   add     hl,de
 155+ 8C5B C9                                   ret
 156+ 8C5C 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 157+ 8C5D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 158+ 8C5F 67                                   ld      h,a
 159+ 8C60 7A                                   ld      a,d
 160+ 8C61 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 161+ 8C63 57                                   ld      d,a
 162+ 8C64 19                                   add     hl,de
 163+ 8C65 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 164+ 8C67 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 165+ 8C68 67                                   ld      h,a
 166+ 8C69 C9                                   ret
 167+ 8C6A 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; here HL and DE are opposite  so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 168+ 8C6B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 169+ 8C6D 67                                   ld      h,a
 170+ 8C6E 7A                                   ld      a,d
 171+ 8C6F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 172+ 8C71 57                                   ld      d,a
 173+ 8C72 B7                                   or      a
 174+ 8C73 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 175+ 8C75 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 176+ 8C77 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 177+ 8C78 B4                                   or      h
 178+ 8C79 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 179+ 8C7A C9                                   ret
 180+ 8C7B              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL
 180+ 8C7B AF          >                    xor a
 180+ 8C7C 95          >                    sub l
 180+ 8C7D 6F          >                    ld l,a
 180+ 8C7E 9F          >                    sbc a,a
 180+ 8C7F 94          >                    sub h
 180+ 8C80 67          >                    ld h,a
 181+ 8C81 78                                   ld      a,b
 182+ 8C82 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 183+ 8C84 B4                                   or      h
 184+ 8C85 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 185+ 8C86 C9                                   ret
 186+ 8C87              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 187+ 8C87 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 188+ 8C89 78                                   ld      a,b
 189+ 8C8A 32 C2 94                             ld      (NumberOfStarsNOSTM),a
 190+ 8C8D 21 0F 96                             ld      hl,varDust
 191+ 8C90 CD 88 8B     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitStarAtHL
 192+ 8C93 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 193+ 8C95 C9                                   ret
 194+ 8C96              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 195+ 8C96 06 0B        InitialiseHyperStars:   ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 196+ 8C98 78                                   ld      a,b
 197+ 8C99 32 C2 94                             ld      (NumberOfStarsNOSTM),a
 198+ 8C9C 21 0F 96                             ld      hl,varDust
 199+ 8C9F CD C6 8B     .InitStarsLoop:         call    InitHyperStarAtHL
 200+ 8CA2 10 FB                                djnz    .InitStarsLoop
 201+ 8CA4 C9                                   ret
 202+ 8CA5              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 203+ 8CA5              StarsForward:          ; break
 204+ 8CA5 3A C2 94                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 205+ 8CA8 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get the number of stars to process
 206+ 8CA9 FD 21 0F 96                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 207+ 8CAD C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 208+ 8CAE FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)
 209+ 8CB1 5F                                   ld      e,a
 210+ 8CB2 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 211+ 8CB4 3A A6 93                             ld      a,(DELTA)
 212+ 8CB7 FE 00                                cp      0
 213+ 8CB9 20 01                                jr      nz,.NormalSpeed
 214+ 8CBB 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so the is at lest some dust movement
 215+ 8CBC 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a
 216+ 8CBD 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 217+ 8CBF CD 80 A3                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = BC.DE , HL = remainder
 218+ 8CC2                                      ShiftHLRight1
 218+ 8CC2 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 218+ 8CC4 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 219+ 8CC6                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 219+ 8CC6 CB 3C       >			   srl h
 219+ 8CC8 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 220+ 8CCA 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 221+ 8CCB F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 222+ 8CCD DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 223+ 8CCF FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 223+ 8CD3 66 05
 224+ 8CD5 ED 5B A7 93                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 225+ 8CD9 CD 0C 8C                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned
 226+ 8CDC                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar
 226+ 8CDC CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 226+ 8CDE C2 33 8E    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 227+ 8CE1 FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl
 227+ 8CE5 74 05
 228+ 8CE7 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 228+ 8CEB 66 01
 229+ 8CED 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 230+ 8CEE E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 231+ 8CF0 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 232+ 8CF1 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 233+ 8CF3 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 234+ 8CF5 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 235+ 8CF6 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 236+ 8CF8 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 237+ 8CF9 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 238+ 8CFA CD 4D 8C                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 239+ 8CFD 7C                                   ld      a,h
 240+ 8CFE E6 7F                                and     $7F
 241+ 8D00                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 241+ 8D00 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 241+ 8D02 D2 33 8E    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 242+ 8D05 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 242+ 8D09 74 01
 243+ 8D0B FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 243+ 8D0F 66 03
 244+ 8D11 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 245+ 8D12 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 246+ 8D14 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 247+ 8D15 DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 248+ 8D17 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 249+ 8D19 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 250+ 8D1A E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 251+ 8D1C B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 252+ 8D1D 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 253+ 8D1E CD 4D 8C                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 254+ 8D21 7C                                   ld      a,h
 255+ 8D22 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 256+ 8D24                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 256+ 8D24 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 256+ 8D26 D2 33 8E    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 257+ 8D29 7C                                   ld      a,h
 258+ 8D2A E6 80                                and     $80
 259+ 8D2C 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 260+ 8D2E 7C                                   ld      a,h
 261+ 8D2F                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 261+ 8D2F FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 261+ 8D31 D2 33 8E    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 262+ 8D34 FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 262+ 8D38 74 03
 263+ 8D3A              ; Now roll
 264+ 8D3A              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 265+ 8D3A 2A 67 93     .XRoll:                 ld      hl,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 266+ 8D3D 7D                                   ld      a,l
 267+ 8D3E FE 00                                cp      0
 268+ 8D40 28 4C                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 269+ 8D42                                      ;break
 270+ 8D42                                      ;ld      a,$80
 271+ 8D42                                      ;xor     l                                   ; l = flipped sign as we are rotating stars not us
 272+ 8D42 E5                                   push    hl
 273+ 8D43 7C                                   ld      a,h
 274+ 8D44 E6 80                                and     $80
 275+ 8D46 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 276+ 8D47 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 277+ 8D48 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 278+ 8D4B 5F                                   ld      e,a
 279+ 8D4C E6 80                                and     $80
 280+ 8D4E 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 281+ 8D4F 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 282+ 8D50 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 283+ 8D52 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 284+ 8D53 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 285+ 8D55 79                                   ld      a,c
 286+ 8D56 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 287+ 8D57 B2                                   or      d
 288+ 8D58 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 289+ 8D59 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 289+ 8D5D 66 01
 290+ 8D5F CD 0C 8C                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 291+ 8D62 FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 291+ 8D66 74 01
 292+ 8D68              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 293+ 8D68              .YRoll:                 ;break
 294+ 8D68 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 295+ 8D69 7C                                   ld      a,h
 296+ 8D6A E6 80                                and     $80
 297+ 8D6C 4F           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 298+ 8D6D 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 299+ 8D6E FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 300+ 8D71 5F                                   ld      e,a
 301+ 8D72 E6 80                                and     $80
 302+ 8D74 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 303+ 8D75 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 304+ 8D76 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 305+ 8D78 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 306+ 8D79 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 307+ 8D7B 79                                   ld      a,c
 308+ 8D7C A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 309+ 8D7D B2                                   or      d
 310+ 8D7E 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 311+ 8D7F FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 311+ 8D83 66 03
 312+ 8D85 CD 4D 8C                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 313+ 8D88 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 313+ 8D8C 74 03
 314+ 8D8E 3A 59 93     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 315+ 8D91 FE 00                                cp      0
 316+ 8D93 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 317+ 8D95              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 318+ 8D95 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 319+ 8D96 FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 320+ 8D99 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 321+ 8D9A ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 322+ 8D9C 5F                                   ld      e,a
 323+ 8D9D ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 324+ 8D9F                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 324+ 8D9F CB 23       >			   sla e
 324+ 8DA1 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 325+ 8DA3 3A 5B 93                             ld      a,(BET2FLIP)                        ; get inverted Sign
 326+ 8DA6 B2                                   or      d
 327+ 8DA7 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 328+ 8DA8 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 328+ 8DAC 66 03
 329+ 8DAE CD 4D 8C                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned
 330+ 8DB1 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 330+ 8DB5 74 03
 331+ 8DB7              ; now work out screen pos
 332+ 8DB7              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 333+ 8DB7              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 334+ 8DB7              ;        pop     de
 335+ 8DB7               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 336+ 8DB7                                      ;pop     de
 337+ 8DB7              .NoPitch:
 338+ 8DB7 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 339+ 8DBA 6F                                   ld      l,a
 340+ 8DBB E6 7F                                and     $7F
 341+ 8DBD                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 341+ 8DBD CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 341+ 8DBF C2 C8 8D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 342+ 8DC2 C6 80                                add     a,$80
 343+ 8DC4 4F                                   ld      c,a
 344+ 8DC5 C3 CD 8D                             jp      StarDoneX
 345+ 8DC8 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 346+ 8DC9 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 347+ 8DCB 90                                   sub     b
 348+ 8DCC 4F                                   ld      c,a
 349+ 8DCD FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 350+ 8DD0 6F                                   ld      l,a
 351+ 8DD1 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 352+ 8DD3                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 352+ 8DD3 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 352+ 8DD5 C2 DE 8D    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 353+ 8DD8 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 354+ 8DDA 47                                   ld      b,a
 355+ 8DDB C3 E3 8D                             jp      StarDoneY
 356+ 8DDE 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 357+ 8DDF 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 358+ 8DE1 90                                   sub     b
 359+ 8DE2 47                                   ld      b,a
 360+ 8DE3 3E FC        StarDoneY:              ld      a,$FC
 361+ 8DE5 C5                                   push    bc
 362+ 8DE6              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 362+ 8DE6 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 363+ 8DEA CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 364+ 8DED FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 365+ 8DF0 C1                                   pop    bc
 366+ 8DF1                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 366+ 8DF1 FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 366+ 8DF3 D2 23 8E    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 367+ 8DF6 3E D8                                ld      a,$D8
 368+ 8DF8 0C                                   inc     c
 369+ 8DF9 C5                                   push    bc
 370+ 8DFA                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 370+ 8DFA ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 371+ 8DFE CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 372+ 8E01 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 373+ 8E04 C1                                   pop    bc
 374+ 8E05                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 374+ 8E05 FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 374+ 8E07 D2 23 8E    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 375+ 8E0A 3E B4                                ld      a,$B4
 376+ 8E0C 04                                   inc     b
 377+ 8E0D C5                                   push    bc
 378+ 8E0E                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 378+ 8E0E ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 379+ 8E12 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 380+ 8E15 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 381+ 8E18 C1                                   pop    bc
 382+ 8E19 3E B4                                ld      a,$B4
 383+ 8E1B 0D                                   dec     c
 384+ 8E1C                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 384+ 8E1C ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 385+ 8E20 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 386+ 8E23 C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 387+ 8E24 FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1
 388+ 8E26 E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 389+ 8E27 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 390+ 8E2B E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 391+ 8E2C FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 392+ 8E2E 05                                   dec     b
 393+ 8E2F C2 AD 8C                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 394+ 8E32 C9                                   ret
 395+ 8E33              ResetStar:              ;break
 396+ 8E33                                      ;pop     de
 397+ 8E33 C1                                   pop     bc                                      ; 0
 398+ 8E34 3A C2 94                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 399+ 8E37 90                                   sub     b
 400+ 8E38 57                                   ld      d,a
 401+ 8E39 1E 06                                ld      e,6
 402+ 8E3B ED 30                                mul
 403+ 8E3D 21 0F 96                             ld      hl,varDust
 404+ 8E40 19                                   add     hl,de
 405+ 8E41 CD 88 8B                             call    InitStarAtHL
 406+ 8E44 C3 2B 8E                             jp      NextStarLoop2
 407+ 8E47              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 408+ 8E47 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 409+ 8E4A FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 410+ 8E4D 6F                                   ld      l,a
 411+ 8E4E E6 7F                                and     $7F
 412+ 8E50 47                                   ld      b,a
 413+ 8E51 CD 23 A3                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 414+ 8E54 7D                                   ld      a,l
 415+ 8E55                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 415+ 8E55 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 415+ 8E57 C2 62 8E    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 416+ 8E5A              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 417+ 8E5A 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 418+ 8E5C 26 00                                ld          h,0
 419+ 8E5E 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 420+ 8E5F C3 69 8E                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 421+ 8E62              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 422+ 8E62 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 423+ 8E64 26 00                                ld          h,0
 424+ 8E66                                      ClearCarryFlag
 424+ 8E66 B7          >                    or a
 425+ 8E67 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 426+ 8E69              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 427+ 8E69 7D                                   ld          a,l
 428+ 8E6A 32 67 96                             ld          (varStarX),a
 429+ 8E6D C9                                   ret
 430+ 8E6E
 431+ 8E6E FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 432+ 8E71 FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 433+ 8E74 6F                                   ld          l,a
 434+ 8E75 E6 7F                                and         $7F
 435+ 8E77 47                                   ld          b,a
 436+ 8E78 CD 23 A3                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 437+ 8E7B 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 438+ 8E7C                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 438+ 8E7C CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 438+ 8E7E C2 89 8E    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 439+ 8E81                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 440+ 8E81 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 441+ 8E83                                      ClearCarryFlag
 441+ 8E83 B7          >                    or a
 442+ 8E84 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 443+ 8E86 C3 8E 8E                             jp          StarStoreYPoint

  12+ 8E93              JumpIfObjectOutsideFov: MACRO target
  13+ 8E93 ~            LL10CheckXInFoV:
  14+ 8E93 ~                                    ld		hl, (INWKxlo)                   ; compare inkwk to to inwk z                                      ;    else
  15+ 8E93 ~                                    ld		de, (INWKzlo)                   ; we can compare as ABS given + or - extreems will be out of view ;         .
  16+ 8E93 ~                                    or		a							    ; clear carry flag for sbc                                        ;         .
  17+ 8E93 ~                                    sbc		hl,de                           ; FOV is 90degrees                                                ;         .
  18+ 8E93 ~                                    bit     7,h
  19+ 8E93 ~                                    jp      z,target                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  20+ 8E93 ~            LL10CheckYInFoV:

  22+ 8E93 ~                                    or		a							    ; clear carry flag                                                ;         .
  23+ 8E93 ~                                    sbc		hl,de                           ; and test y axis, FOV is 90degrees                               ;         .
  24+ 8E93 ~                                    bit     7,h
  25+ 8E93 ~                                    jp      z,target                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .

   5+ 8FC0
   6+ 8FC0 3E FF        SetLastFaceVisCall: ld      a,$FF
   7+ 8FC2 32 B3 C0                         ld      (UbnkFaceVisArray+15),a
   8+ 8FC5 C9                               ret
   9+ 8FC6
  10+ 8FC6              CheckIfExplodingCall:
  11+ 8FC6              ; DEBUG TODO turn into MACRO later
  12+ 8FC6              ; Sets Z flag to true if only some faces are visible
  13+ 8FC6              ; Clears Z flag if exploding so all faces should be rendered
  14+ 8FC6 3A 2B C0             ld      a,(UBnkexplDsp)                 ; INWK+31                                                                               ;;; If bit 5 of exploding state is clear
  15+ 8FC9              ;;DEBUG
  16+ 8FC9 F6 FF                or      $FF ; force bit 5 set so exploding
  17+ 8FCB 32 2B C0             ld      (UBnkexplDsp),a
  18+ 8FCE              ;;DEBUG
  19+ 8FCE 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; save explDsp into c                                                                   ;;;
  20+ 8FCF E6 20                and     $20                         ; mask bit5 exploding                                                                   ;;;
  21+ 8FD1 C9                   ret
  22+ 8FD2
  23+ 8FD2
  24+ 8FD2              DrawForwardsIXL:
  25+ 8FD2              DrawForwards:
  26+ 8FD2              LL17:                                       ; draw Wireframe (including nodes exploding)                                            ;;; LL17 draw Wireframe
  27+ 8FD2              ; Copy the three orientation vectors into XX16
  28+ 8FD2 CD C1 CF     LL15:   call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; Copy Ship rotation to XX16                                                                                          ;;; load object position to camera matrix XX16 			::LL91 (ish)
  29+ 8FD5              ;;;;LL21:   call    NormaliseTransMat       ; Normalise XX16
  30+ 8FD5 CD 77 D2     LL91lc: call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; Load Ship Coords to XX18
  31+ 8FD8              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;;
  32+ 8FD8              LastNormalAlwaysVisible:
  33+ 8FD8 CD C0 8F             call    SetLastFaceVisCall          ; DEBUG TODO revert back to MACRO later                                                                                                          ;;; Set last Normal to visible FF regarless
  34+ 8FDB              ; HEre original does LDY 12
  35+ 8FDB              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;; (Originally loaded faces count here and stored in B, but will remove to simplify code)
  36+ 8FDB              CheckIfExplodingState:
  37+ 8FDB CD C6 8F             call    CheckIfExplodingCall
  38+ 8FDE 28 0C                jr      z,CullBackFaces             ; EE29 no, only Some visible                                                            ;;;    Goto EE29 - Only some faces visible
  39+ 8FE0              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;; else
  40+ 8FE0              ItIsExploding:
  41+ 8FE0              MakeAllFacesVisible:                                                                                                                        ;;;    Set all faces in XX0 visible
  42+ 8FE0 CD DD D0             call    SetAllFacesVisible          ; code point EE30                                                                      ;;;
  43+ 8FE3 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; X = 0                                                                                 ;;;
  44+ 8FE5                      ldWriteZero LastNormalVisible       ; XX4  \ visibility                                                                     ;;;    XX4 visibility = 0
  44+ 8FE5 AF          >               xor      a
  44+ 8FE6 32 41 93    >               ld       (LastNormalVisible),a
  45+ 8FE9              LL41:                                       ; visibilities now set in XX2,X Transpose matrix.                                       ;;;
  46+ 8FE9 C3 EF 8F             jp      TransposeMatrix             ; LL42 \ jump to transpose matrix and onwards                                           ;;;    goto LL42
  47+ 8FEC              ; ......................................................                                                                            ;;;
  48+ 8FEC              CullBackFaces:
  49+ 8FEC              EE29Entry:
  50+ 8FEC CD 66 D5             call    CullV2
  51+ 8FEF              ;-- All normals' visibilities now set in XX2,X                                                                                      ;;;
  52+ 8FEF              TransposeMatrix:
  53+ 8FEF              LL42:	                                    ; DO nodeX-Ycoords their comment  \  TrnspMat                                           ;;; ......................................................
  54+ 8FEF CD 44 D1             call    InverseXX16
  55+ 8FF2
  56+ 8FF2
  57+ 8FF2 CD AF DC             call    ProcessNodes                ; Loop through and determine visibility based on faces and position
  58+ 8FF5              DrawResults:
  59+ 8FF5 CD 81 DD             call    PrepLines                   ; LL72, process lines and clip
  60+ 8FF8 CD 94 8F             call    DrawLines                   ; Need to plot all lines
  61+ 8FFB C9                   ret
  62+ 8FFC
# file closed: ./ModelRender/drawforwards-LL17.asm
 856  8FFC
 857  8FFC                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
   1+ 8FFC
   2+ 8FFC 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 8FFD 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 9001 7D
   4+ 9002 FC 8F        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 9004 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 9006 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 9009 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 900B 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 900F              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 900F
  11+ 900F              memfill_dma:
  12+ 900F              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 900F              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 900F 32 FC 8F     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 9012              .set_target:
  16+ 9012 22 09 90     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 9015              .set_length:
  18+ 9015 ED 53 04 90  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 9019              .write_dma:
  20+ 9019 21 FD 8F     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 901C 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 901E 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 9020 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 9022 C9           	ret
  25+ 9023
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 858  9023                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 9023
   2+ 9023 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 9027 7D
   3+ 9028 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 902A 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 902C 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 902F 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 9031 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 9035              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 9035
  10+ 9035              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 9035              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 9035              .set_target:
  13+ 9035 22 2F 90     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 9038              .set_source:
  15+ 9038 ED 53 28 90  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 903C              .set_length:
  17+ 903C ED 43 2A 90  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 9040              .write_dma:
  19+ 9040 21 23 90     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 9043 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 9045 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 9047 ED B3        	otir
  23+ 9049 C9           	ret
  24+ 904A
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm

 222+ 9102              addr_Pressed_Distance      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Distance
 223+ 9102              addr_Pressed_HomeCursor    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_HomeCursor
 224+ 9102              addr_Pressed_Launch        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Launch
 225+ 9102              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 226+ 9102              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 227+ 9102              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 228+ 9102              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 229+ 9102              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 230+ 9102              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 231+ 9102              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 232+ 9102              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 233+ 9102              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 234+ 9102              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save

 236+ 9102              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume

 238+ 9102              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit

 240+ 9102              addr_Pressed_CursorUp      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorUp

 242+ 9102              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 243+ 9102
 244+ 9102
 245+ 9102              MIsKeyPressed:      MACRO   keyaddress, misstarget
 246+ 9102 ~                                ld      hl,(keyaddress)
 247+ 9102 ~                                ld      a,(hl)
 248+ 9102 ~                                IfAIsZeroGoto   misstarget
 249+ 9102                                  ENDM
 250+ 9102
 251+ 9102 21 4A 90     init_keyboard:      ld		hl,Keys
 252+ 9105 11 28 00                         ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen
 253+ 9108 3E 00                            ld		a,0
 254+ 910A CD 0F 90                         call	memfill_dma
 255+ 910D C9                               ret
 256+ 910E
 257+ 910E 21 72 90     scan_keyboard:      ld		hl,RawKeys
 258+ 9111 11 7A 90                         ld		de,KeyAddrTab
 259+ 9114 AF                               xor		a
 260+ 9115 FD 2E 08                         ld		iyl,8
 261+ 9118 DD 21 4A 90                      ld      ix,Keys
 262+ 911C 1A           .PortReadLoop:      ld		a,(de)							; Set up BC as port to read
 263+ 911D 4F                               ld		c,a
 264+ 911E 13                               inc		de
 265+ 911F 1A                               ld      a,(de)
 266+ 9120 47                               ld		b,a
 267+ 9121 13                               inc		de
 268+ 9122 ED 78                            in		a,(c)							; read port to a
 269+ 9124 77                               ld		(hl),a							; set raw keys to value
 270+ 9125 23                               inc		hl								; and ready for next element
 271+ 9126 06 05                            ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 272+ 9128 CB 47        .ProcessBitsLoop:   bit		0,a								; is bit set
 273+ 912A 28 07                            jr      z,.SetKeyPressed
 274+ 912C 08                               ex      af,af'
 275+ 912D AF                               xor     a
 276+ 912E C3 3A 91                         jp      .SetKey
 277+ 9131 20 0B                            jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 278+ 9133 08           .SetKeyPressed:	    ex		af,af'
 279+ 9134 DD 7E 00                         ld      a,(ix+0)
 280+ 9137 3C                               inc     a
 281+ 9138 E6 03                            and     $3                              ; so bit 0 set is pressed, bit 1 set is repeat pressed, i.e. 0 = no, 1 = yes 2,3 = held
 282+ 913A DD 77 00     .SetKey:            ld		(ix+0),a							; Key Pressed
 283+ 913D 08                               ex		af,af'
 284+ 913E DD 23        .SkipKeySet:	    inc		ix								; move to next key
 285+ 9140 CB 3F                            srl		a								; move next key into bit 0
 286+ 9142 10 E4                            djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 287+ 9144 FD 2D                            dec     iyl
 288+ 9146 20 D4                            jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 289+ 9148 C9                               ret
 290+ 9149
 291+ 9149              GetKeyStateAddressDE: MACRO
 292+ 9149 ~                                  ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 293+ 9149 ~                                  add     hl,a
 294+ 9149 ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 295+ 9149 ~                                  ld      e,a
 296+ 9149 ~                                  inc     hl
 297+ 9149 ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 298+ 9149 ~                                  ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 299+ 9149                                    ENDM
 300+ 9149
 301+ 9149
 302+ 9149              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping
 303+ 9149              wait_for_key_a_press:       GetKeyStateAddressDE
 303+ 9149 21 8A 90    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 303+ 914C ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 303+ 914E 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 303+ 914F 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 303+ 9150 23          >                      inc     hl
 303+ 9151 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 303+ 9152 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 304+ 9153 D5                                       push    de
 305+ 9154 CD 0E 91     wait_for_key_press_loop:    call    scan_keyboard
 306+ 9157 E1                                       pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 307+ 9158 E5                                       push    hl
 308+ 9159 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 309+ 915A                                          JumpIfANENusng  1,wait_for_key_press_loop         ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 309+ 915A FE 01       >                cp     1
 309+ 915C C2 54 91    >                jp      nz,wait_for_key_press_loop
 310+ 915F E1                                       pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 311+ 9160 C9                                       ret
 312+ 9161
 313+ 9161              wait_for_key_a_held:        GetKeyStateAddressDE
 313+ 9161 21 8A 90    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 313+ 9164 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 313+ 9166 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 313+ 9167 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 313+ 9168 23          >                      inc     hl
 313+ 9169 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 313+ 916A 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 314+ 916B D5                                       push    de
 315+ 916C CD 0E 91     wait_for_key_a_held_loop:   call    scan_keyboard
 316+ 916F E1                                       pop     hl
 317+ 9170 E5                                       push    hl
 318+ 9171 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)
 319+ 9172                                          JumpIfALTNusng  2,wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 319+ 9172 FE 02       >                        cp      2
 319+ 9174 DA 6C 91    >                        jp		c, wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 320+ 9177 E1                                       pop     hl
 321+ 9178 C9                                       ret
 322+ 9179
 323+ 9179              get_key_a_state:            GetKeyStateAddressDE                 ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 323+ 9179 21 8A 90    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 323+ 917C ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 323+ 917E 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 323+ 917F 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 323+ 9180 23          >                      inc     hl
 323+ 9181 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 323+ 9182 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 324+ 9183 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 325+ 9184 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                        ; a = keystate
 326+ 9185 C9                                       ret
 327+ 9186
 328+ 9186              force_key_press:            GetKeyStateAddressDE
 328+ 9186 21 8A 90    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 328+ 9189 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 328+ 918B 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 328+ 918C 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 328+ 918D 23          >                      inc     hl
 328+ 918E 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 328+ 918F 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 329+ 9190 EB                                       ex      de,hl
 330+ 9191 3E 01                                    ld      a,1
 331+ 9193 77                                       ld      (hl),a
 332+ 9194 C9                                       ret
 333+ 9195
 334+ 9195              ; returns z is set if c_ key is pressed
 335+ 9195              is_key_pressed:             GetKeyStateAddressDE
 335+ 9195 21 8A 90    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 335+ 9198 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 335+ 919A 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 919B 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 335+ 919C 23          >                      inc     hl
 335+ 919D 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 919E 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 336+ 919F EB                                       ex      de,hl
 337+ 91A0 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 338+ 91A1 FE 01                                    cp      1
 339+ 91A3 C9                                       ret
 340+ 91A4
 341+ 91A4              ; returns z is set if c_ key is held
 342+ 91A4              is_key_held:                GetKeyStateAddressDE
 342+ 91A4 21 8A 90    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 342+ 91A7 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 342+ 91A9 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 91AA 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 342+ 91AB 23          >                      inc     hl
 342+ 91AC 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 91AD 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 343+ 91AE EB                                       ex      de,hl
 344+ 91AF 7E                                       ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 345+ 91B0 E6 02                                    and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 346+ 91B2 FE 02                                    cp      2
 347+ 91B4 C9                                       ret
 348+ 91B5
 349+ 91B5              is_any_key_pressed:
 350+ 91B5 21 4A 90         ld      hl,Keys
 351+ 91B8 06 28            ld      b,40
 352+ 91BA 0E 00            ld      c,0
 353+ 91BC              .KeyReadLoop:
 354+ 91BC 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 355+ 91BD FE 01            cp      1
 356+ 91BF CA C9 91         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 357+ 91C2 23               inc     hl
 358+ 91C3 0C               inc     c
 359+ 91C4 10 F6            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 360+ 91C6 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 361+ 91C8 C9               ret
 362+ 91C9              .KeyPressed:
 363+ 91C9 79               ld      a,c
 364+ 91CA C9               ret
 365+ 91CB
 366+ 91CB              is_any_key_held:
 367+ 91CB 21 4A 90         ld      hl,Keys
 368+ 91CE 06 28            ld      b,40
 369+ 91D0 0E 00            ld      c,0
 370+ 91D2              .KeyReadLoop:
 371+ 91D2 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 372+ 91D3 E6 02            and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 373+ 91D5 FE 02            cp      2
 374+ 91D7 CA E1 91         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 375+ 91DA 23               inc     hl
 376+ 91DB 0C               inc     c
 377+ 91DC 10 F4            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 378+ 91DE 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 379+ 91E0 C9               ret
 380+ 91E1              .KeyPressed:
 381+ 91E1 79               ld      a,c
 382+ 91E2 C9               ret
 383+ 91E3
 384+ 91E3
 385+ 91E3 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 386+ 9201 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 387+ 9202 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 388+ 9203 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 389+ 9204 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 390+ 9205              InputLimit              EQU 20
 391+ 9205
 392+ 9205              keyboard_copy_input_to_de:
 393+ 9205 21 E3 91         ld      hl,InputString
 394+ 9208 3A 02 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 395+ 920B FE 00            cp      0
 396+ 920D 28 05            jr      z,.NoString
 397+ 920F 4F               ld      c,a
 398+ 9210 06 00            ld      b,0
 399+ 9212 ED B0            ldir
 400+ 9214              .NoString
 401+ 9214 3E 00            ld      a,0
 402+ 9216 12               ld      (de),a
 403+ 9217 C9               ret
 404+ 9218
 405+ 9218              initInputText:
 406+ 9218 AF               xor     a
 407+ 9219 32 02 92         ld      (InputCursor),a
 408+ 921C 32 03 92         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 409+ 921F 32 04 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 410+ 9222 21 E3 91         ld      hl,InputString
 411+ 9225 06 1E            ld      b,30
 412+ 9227              .wipeloop:
 413+ 9227 77               ld      (hl),a
 414+ 9228 23               inc     hl
 415+ 9229 10 FC            djnz    .wipeloop
 416+ 922B C9               ret
 417+ 922C
 418+ 922C AF           InputName:                  xor     a
 419+ 922D 32 04 92                                 ld      (InputChanged),a
 420+ 9230 CD B5 91                                 call    is_any_key_pressed
 421+ 9233 FE FF                                    cp      $FF
 422+ 9235 C8                                       ret     z
 423+ 9236              .KeyPressed:
 424+ 9236 4F               ld      c,a
 425+ 9237 3A 02 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 426+ 923A FE 14            cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 427+ 923C 28 0B            jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 428+ 923E 21 DA 90         ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 429+ 9241 79               ld      a,c
 430+ 9242 ED 31            add     hl,a
 431+ 9244 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 432+ 9245 FE 41            cp      "A"
 433+ 9247 30 15            jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 434+ 9249              .DeleteOrEnterOnly                          ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 435+ 9249 FE 30            cp      "0"                             ; if 0 was preseed check caps shift too
 436+ 924B 28 3B            jr      z,.CheckShiftDelete             ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 437+ 924D FE 3E            cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 438+ 924F 28 24            jr      z,.EnterPressed
 439+ 9251 FE 23            cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 440+ 9253 28 33            jr      z,.CapsPressed
 441+ 9255 FE 5E            cp      "^"         ; SYMBOLSHIFT
 442+ 9257 28 2F            jr      z,.SymbolPressed
 443+ 9259 FE 20            cp      " "         ; space
 444+ 925B 28 2B            jr      z,.SpacePressed
 445+ 925D C9               ret
 446+ 925E              .AlphaPressed:
 447+ 925E 47               ld      b,a
 448+ 925F 3A 02 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 449+ 9262 4F               ld      c,a
 450+ 9263 21 E3 91         ld      hl,InputString
 451+ 9266 ED 31            add     hl,a
 452+ 9268 78               ld      a,b
 453+ 9269 70               ld      (hl),b
 454+ 926A 79               ld      a,c
 455+ 926B 21 02 92         ld      hl,InputCursor
 456+ 926E 34               inc     (hl)
 457+ 926F 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 458+ 9271 32 04 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 459+ 9274 C9               ret
 460+ 9275              .EnterPressed:
 461+ 9275 3A 02 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 462+ 9278 3C               inc     a
 463+ 9279 21 E3 91         ld      hl,InputString
 464+ 927C ED 31            add     hl,a
 465+ 927E AF               xor     a
 466+ 927F 77               ld      (hl),a
 467+ 9280 3D               dec     a
 468+ 9281 32 03 92         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 469+ 9284 32 04 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 470+ 9287 C9               ret
 471+ 9288              .CheckShiftDelete:
 472+ 9288              .CapsPressed:                               ; act as a delete key for now
 473+ 9288              .SymbolPressed:
 474+ 9288              .SpacePressed:
 475+ 9288 3A 02 92         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 476+ 928B FE 00            cp      0
 477+ 928D C8               ret     z
 478+ 928E 3D               dec     a
 479+ 928F 32 02 92         ld      (InputCursor),a
 480+ 9292 21 E3 91         ld      hl,InputString
 481+ 9295 ED 31            add     hl,a
 482+ 9297 AF               xor     a
 483+ 9298 77               ld      (hl),a
 484+ 9299 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 485+ 929B 32 04 92         ld      (InputChanged),a
 486+ 929E C9               ret
 487+ 929F
 488+ 929F              MovementKeyTest:
 489+ 929F              ;DBG1:jp dbg1
 490+ 929F              ;dbx1:
 491+ 929F AF               xor     a
 492+ 92A0 32 B4 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 493+ 92A3 3A B6 93         ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 494+ 92A6 E6 FC            and     $FC
 495+ 92A8 20 26            jr      nz,CursorKeys
 496+ 92AA              ClimbDiveKeys:
 497+ 92AA 2A 98 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 498+ 92AD 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 499+ 92AE                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanDiveKey
 499+ 92AE A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 499+ 92AF CA BD 92    >				jp	z, ScanDiveKey
 500+ 92B2 3A B4 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 501+ 92B5 F6 80            or      $80
 502+ 92B7 32 B4 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 503+ 92BA C3 F3 92         jp      ScanLeftKey
 504+ 92BD              ScanDiveKey:
 505+ 92BD 2A 96 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)
 506+ 92C0 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 507+ 92C1                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanLeftKey
 507+ 92C1 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 507+ 92C2 CA F3 92    >				jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 508+ 92C5 3A B4 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 509+ 92C8 F6 40            or      $40
 510+ 92CA 32 B4 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 511+ 92CD C3 F3 92         jp      ScanLeftKey
 512+ 92D0              CursorKeys:
 513+ 92D0 2A D4 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)
 514+ 92D3 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 515+ 92D4                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanCursorDownKey
 515+ 92D4 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 515+ 92D5 CA E3 92    >				jp	z, ScanCursorDownKey
 516+ 92D8 3A B4 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 517+ 92DB F6 80            or      $80
 518+ 92DD 32 B4 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 519+ 92E0 C3 F3 92         jp      ScanLeftKey
 520+ 92E3              ScanCursorDownKey
 521+ 92E3 2A D6 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 522+ 92E6 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 523+ 92E7                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanLeftKey
 523+ 92E7 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 523+ 92E8 CA F3 92    >				jp	z, ScanLeftKey
 524+ 92EB 3A B4 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 525+ 92EE F6 40            or      $40
 526+ 92F0 32 B4 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 527+ 92F3              ScanLeftKey:
 528+ 92F3 2A 92 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 529+ 92F6 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 530+ 92F7                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanRightKey
 530+ 92F7 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 530+ 92F8 CA 04 93    >				jp	z, ScanRightKey
 531+ 92FB 3A B4 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 532+ 92FE F6 20            or      $20
 533+ 9300 32 B4 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 534+ 9303 C9               ret
 535+ 9304              ScanRightKey:
 536+ 9304 2A 94 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 537+ 9307 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 538+ 9308                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanHomeKey
 538+ 9308 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 538+ 9309 CA 15 93    >				jp	z, ScanHomeKey
 539+ 930C 3A B4 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 540+ 930F F6 10            or      $10
 541+ 9311 32 B4 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 542+ 9314 C9               ret
 543+ 9315              ScanHomeKey:
 544+ 9315 2A B2 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 545+ 9318 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 546+ 9319                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanRecentreKey
 546+ 9319 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 546+ 931A CA 26 93    >				jp	z, ScanRecentreKey
 547+ 931D 3A B4 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 548+ 9320 F6 08            or      $08
 549+ 9322 32 B4 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 550+ 9325 C9               ret
 551+ 9326              ScanRecentreKey:
 552+ 9326 2A CE 90         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Recentre)
 553+ 9329 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 554+ 932A                  ReturnIfAIsZero
 554+ 932A A7          >                    and a
 554+ 932B C8          >                    ret    z
 555+ 932C 3A B4 93         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 556+ 932F F6 04            or      $04
 557+ 9331 32 B4 93         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 558+ 9334 C9               ret

  49+ 9335              ; Ship Data
  50+ 9335              ;;;;	.XX21	\ -> &5600 \ Table of pointers to ships' data given to XX0
  51+ 9335              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen
  52+ 9335              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  2 is #SST  Space Station, Coriolis or Dodo.

 389+ 9413              ; For the UniverseSlot list, for an optimisation the type slot will be the ship type, e.g. ship type this will optimise searching for a station or star
 390+ 9413              ; bit 7 will be set for a sun or planet so we can only ever have 128 types of ship, in relality there are about 3 types
 391+ 9413              ; note this is ship type as it space station, transporter, pirate etc not model of ship

 452+ 947B 00 00 00...  DampingKeys				DS  7				; 0387 - 038D
 453+ 9482              ;  #&6 Does K toggle keyboard/joystick control -  03CD certainly makes keyboard not work anymore.
 454+ 9482              ;  #&5 Does J reverse both joystick channels
 455+ 9482              ;  #&4 Does Y reverse joystick Y channel			03CB
 456+ 9482              ;  #&3 Does F toggle flashing information			03CA
 457+ 9482              ;  #&2 Does X toggle startup message display ? PATG?	03C9
 458+ 9482              ;  #&1 Does A toggle keyboard auto-recentering ?
 459+ 9482              ;  #&0 Caps-lock toggles keyboard flight damping

   1+ 96F9 AF           ClearSlotCount:         xor     a
   2+ 96FA 21 1F 94                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotCount
   3+ 96FD 06 18                                ld      b, UniverseListSize * 2
   4+ 96FF 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a
   5+ 9700 23                                   inc     hl
   6+ 9701 10 FC                                djnz    .fillLoop
   7+ 9703 C9                                   ret
   8+ 9704
   9+ 9704              ; Initialises all types to a count of 1 where there is an occupied universe slot
  10+ 9704              ; this needs expanding to cater for a missing type, find type and increment count (use cpir?)
  11+ 9704 CD F9 96     CorrectSlotCount:       call    ClearSlotCount
  12+ 9707 21 1F 94                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotCount
  13+ 970A 11 13 94                             ld      de,UniverseSlotList
  14+ 970D 06 0C                                ld      b,UniverseListSize
  15+ 970F 1A           .fillLoop:              ld      a,(de)
  16+ 9710 FE FF                                cp      $FF
  17+ 9712 28 05                                jr      z,.SkipSlot
  18+ 9714 77           .CorrectSlot:           ld      (hl),a
  19+ 9715 23                                   inc     hl
  20+ 9716 36 01                                ld      (hl),1
  21+ 9718 23                                   inc     hl
  22+ 9719 13           .SkipSlot               inc     de
  23+ 971A 10 F3                                djnz    .fillLoop
  24+ 971C C9                                   ret

  26+ 971D

  32+ 9724 77           .fillLoop:              ld      (hl),a

  48+ 9738 57           ClearFreeSlotListSaveA: ld      d,a

  50+ 973B 21 13 94                             ld      hl,UniverseSlotList
  51+ 973E 06 0C                                ld      b, UniverseListSize
  52+ 9740 79           .fillLoop:              ld      a,c

  54+ 9742 28 03                                jr      z,.SkipSlot
  55+ 9744 3E FF                                ld      a,$FF
  56+ 9746 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  57+ 9747 23           .SkipSlot:              inc     hl
  58+ 9748 10 F6                                djnz    .fillLoop
  59+ 974A C9                                   ret

  67+ 9753 21 13 94     FindSpaceStationSlotInC:ld      hl,UniverseSlotList

  69+ 9758 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  70+ 975A 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
  71+ 975B                                      JumpIfAEqNusng ShipTypeStation, .FoundSlot
  71+ 975B FE 02       >                cp     ShipTypeStation
  71+ 975D CA 66 97    >                jp      z,.FoundSlot
  72+ 9760 0C                                   inc     c

  76+ 9765 C9                                   ret
  77+ 9766              .FoundSlot:             ClearCarryFlag
  77+ 9766 B7          >                    or a
  78+ 9767 C9                                   ret

  93+ 977B 7E           .SearchLoop:            ld      a,(hl)
  94+ 977C                                      JumpIfAEqNusng $FF, .FoundSlot
  94+ 977C FE FF       >                cp     $FF
  94+ 977E CA 87 97    >                jp      z,.FoundSlot

  98+ 9785 37          >                    scf

  11+ 97AD              ;CargoTonnes		    DB	16,1,2,3,4,5,6,7,6,9,10,11,12,13,14,15			; 036F - 037F	QQ20
  12+ 97AD              SlaveCargoTonnes		equ CargoTonnes+3
  13+ 97AD              NarcoticsCargoTonnes	equ CargoTonnes+6
  14+ 97AD              FirearmsCargoTonnes		equ CargoTonnes+10

  16+ 97AD              QQ20                    equ CargoTonnes

  18+ 97C7              ECMPresent				EQU EquipmentFitted + EQ_ECM				; 0380
  19+ 97C7              EnergyBomb				EQU EquipmentFitted + EQ_ENERGY_BOMB		; 0382	Also random hyperspeace in Elite A

  21+ 97C7              DockingComputer 		EQU EquipmentFitted + EQ_DOCK_COMP    		; 0384
