 868  97C8                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 97C8              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 97C8              doRND2:
   3+ 97C8 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 97C9              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 97C9              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & B)"
   6+ 97C9 3A 45 93     doRND:                  ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   7+ 97CC CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
   8+ 97CE 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
   9+ 97CF 21 47 93     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  10+ 97D2 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  11+ 97D3 32 45 93     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  12+ 97D6 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  13+ 97D7 79                                   ld		a,c
  14+ 97D8 32 47 93                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  15+ 97DB 08                                   ex		af,af'
  16+ 97DC 3A 46 93                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  17+ 97DF 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  18+ 97E0 21 48 93     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  19+ 97E3 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  20+ 97E4 32 46 93                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  21+ 97E7 08                                   ex		af,af'
  22+ 97E8 79                                   ld		a,c
  23+ 97E9 32 48 93                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  24+ 97EC 08                                   ex		af,af'
  25+ 97ED C9                                   ret
  26+ 97EE
  27+ 97EE              fillHeapRandom4Points:                      ; counter Y, 4 rnd bytes to edge heap
  28+ 97EE 06 04        	ld		b,4
  29+ 97F0 21 02 C2     	ld		hl,UbnkLineArray				; line data
  30+ 97F3              FillRandom:                                 ; Writes random bytes hl = start address, b = nbr bytes to fill
  31+ 97F3              EE55:
  32+ 97F3 CD C9 97     	call	doRND							; get random
  33+ 97F6 77           	ld		(hl),a							; (XX19),Y
  34+ 97F7 23           	inc		hl
  35+ 97F8 10 F9        	djnz	FillRandom						; 3to6 = random bytes for seed
  36+ 97FA C9               ret
  37+ 97FB
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm

   1+ 97FB 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 97FF 58 59 53 45
   1+ 9803 45 44
   2+ 9805 21 73 94     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 9808 11 96 93                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 980B ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 980D ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 980F ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 9811 ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 9813 ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 9815 ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 9817 C9                                   ret
  11+ 9818
  12+ 9818 21 96 93     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 981B 11 73 94                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 981E 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 9820
  16+ 9820 21 73 94     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 9823 11 A7 94                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 9826 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 9828
  20+ 9828 21 A7 94     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 982B 11 73 94                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 982E 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 9830
  24+ 9830 21 A7 94     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 9833 11 96 93                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 9836 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 9838
  28+ 9838 21 96 93     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 983B 11 A7 94                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 983E 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 9840
  32+ 9840              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 9840 CD 43 98     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 9843              .NextStep:
  35+ 9843 CD 46 98     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 9846              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 9846 3A 96 93     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 9849 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 984A 21 98 93     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 984D 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 984E 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 984F 3A 97 93     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 9852 21 99 93     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 9855 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 9856 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 9857 3A 98 93     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 985A 32 96 93     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 985D 3A 99 93     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 9860 32 97 93     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 9863 3A 9B 93     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 9866 32 99 93     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 9869 3A 9A 93     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 986C 32 98 93     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 986F B7           		or		a
  55+ 9870 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 9871 21 98 93     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 9874 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 9875 32 9A 93     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 9878 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 9879 21 99 93     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 987C 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 987D 32 9B 93     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 9880 C9           		ret
  64+ 9881
  65+ 9881              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 9881 CD 84 98     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 9884              .NextStep:
  68+ 9884 CD 87 98     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 9887              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 9887              ; x = a + c
  71+ 9887 3A A7 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 988A B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 988B 21 A9 94     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 988E 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 988F 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 9890              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 9890 3A A8 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 9893 21 AA 94     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 9896 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 9897 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 9898 3A A9 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 989B 32 A7 94     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 989E 3A AA 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 98A1 32 A8 94     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 98A4 3A AC 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 98A7 32 AA 94     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 98AA 3A AB 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 98AD 32 A9 94     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 98B0 B7           		or		a
  90+ 98B1 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 98B2 21 A9 94     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 98B5 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 98B6 32 AB 94     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 98B9 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 98BA 21 AA 94     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 98BD 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 98BE 32 AC 94     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 98C1 C9           		ret
  99+ 98C2
 100+ 98C2 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 98C3 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 98C4 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 98C5
 104+ 98C5 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 98C6 32 AF 93                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 98C9              .CounterLoop:
 107+ 98C9 3A 97 93     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 108+ 98CC 4F           	ld		c,a
 109+ 98CD              .calcLocaldy:
 110+ 98CD 3A 72 94     	ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 111+ 98D0 47           	ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 112+ 98D1 79           	ld		a,c
 113+ 98D2 90           	sub		b
 114+ 98D3 CB 7F        	bit		7,a
 115+ 98D5 28 02        	jr		z,.positivedy
 116+ 98D7              .negativedy:
 117+ 98D7 ED 44        	neg
 118+ 98D9              .positivedy:
 119+ 98D9 32 C4 98     	ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 120+ 98DC ED 5B C2 98  	ld		de,(working_distX)
 121+ 98E0 BA           	cp		d
 122+ 98E1 30 24        	jr		nc,.toofar
 123+ 98E3              .calcLocaldx:
 124+ 98E3 3A 99 93     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 125+ 98E6 4F           	ld		c,a
 126+ 98E7 3A 71 94     	ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 127+ 98EA 47           	ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 128+ 98EB 79           	ld		a,c
 129+ 98EC 90           	sub		b
 130+ 98ED CB 7F        	bit		7,a
 131+ 98EF 28 02        	jr		z,.positivedx
 132+ 98F1              .negativedx:
 133+ 98F1 ED 44        	neg
 134+ 98F3              .positivedx:
 135+ 98F3 4F           	ld		c,a
 136+ 98F4 BB           	cp		e
 137+ 98F5 30 10        	jr		nc,.toofar
 138+ 98F7              .Nearer:									; we have a closer system
 139+ 98F7 3A C4 98     	ld		a,(current_distY)
 140+ 98FA 47           	ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 141+ 98FB ED 43 C2 98  	ld		(working_distX),bc
 142+ 98FF C5           	push	bc
 143+ 9900 CD 38 98     	call 	copy_system_to_working
 144+ 9903 C1           	pop		bc
 145+ 9904 78           	ld		a,b								;
 146+ 9905 B1           	or		c								;
 147+ 9906 C8           	ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 148+ 9907              .toofar:
 149+ 9907 CD 40 98     	call	next_system_seed
 150+ 990A 3A AF 93     	ld		a,(XSAV)
 151+ 990D 3D           	dec		a
 152+ 990E FE 00        	cp		0
 153+ 9910 C8           	ret		z
 154+ 9911 32 AF 93     	ld		(XSAV),a
 155+ 9914 18 B3        	jr		.CounterLoop
 156+ 9916
 157+ 9916
 158+ 9916              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 159+ 9916 3A A8 94     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 160+ 9919 E6 07        		and		7
 161+ 991B 32 B3 94     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 162+ 991E 3A A9 94     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 163+ 9921 CB 3F        		srl	a
 164+ 9923 CB 3F        		srl	a
 165+ 9925 CB 3F        		srl	a
 166+ 9927 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 167+ 9929 E6 07        		and		7
 168+ 992B 32 B4 94     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 169+ 992E CB 3F        		srl	a
 170+ 9930 FE 00        		cp		0
 171+ 9932 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 172+ 9934              .Fedual:
 173+ 9934 3A B3 94     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 174+ 9937 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 175+ 9939 32 B3 94     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 176+ 993C              .CanBeRich:
 177+ 993C 3A B3 94     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 178+ 993F EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 179+ 9941 32 B5 94     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 180+ 9944 47           		ld		b,a
 181+ 9945 3A AA 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 182+ 9948 E6 03        		and		3
 183+ 994A 80           		add		a,b
 184+ 994B 32 B5 94     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 185+ 994E 3A B4 94     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 186+ 9951 CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 187+ 9953 47           		ld		b,a
 188+ 9954 3A B5 94     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 189+ 9957 80           		add		a,b
 190+ 9958 32 B5 94     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 191+ 995B CB 27        		sla		a
 192+ 995D CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 193+ 995F 47           		ld		b,a
 194+ 9960 3A B3 94     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 195+ 9963 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 196+ 9964 47           		ld		b,a
 197+ 9965 3A B4 94     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 198+ 9968 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 199+ 9969 32 B6 94     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 200+ 996C 3A B3 94     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 201+ 996F EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 202+ 9971 C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 203+ 9973 57           		ld		d,a
 204+ 9974 3A B4 94     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 205+ 9977 C6 04        		add		4
 206+ 9979 5F           		ld		e,a
 207+ 997A ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 208+ 997C 3A B6 94     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 209+ 997F 57           		ld		d,a
 210+ 9980 ED 30        		mul
 211+ 9982 CB 23        		sla		e
 212+ 9984 CB 1A        		rr		d
 213+ 9986 CB 23        		sla		e
 214+ 9988 CB 1A        		rr		d
 215+ 998A CB 23        		sla		e
 216+ 998C CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 217+ 998E ED 53 B8 94  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 218+ 9992              .DoRadius:
 219+ 9992 3A AA 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 220+ 9995 4F           		ld		c,a
 221+ 9996 3A AC 94     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 222+ 9999 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 223+ 999B C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 224+ 999D 47           		ld		b,a							;
 225+ 999E ED 43 BC 94  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 226+ 99A2 C9           		ret

  34+ 9AD3 5E 9A 67 9A  RankingNameIdx		dw RankingName1,RankingName2,RankingName3,RankingName4,RankingName5,RankingName6,RankingName7,RankingName8,RankingName9,RankingName10,RankingName11
  34+ 9AD7 77 9A 7C 9A
  34+ 9ADB 84 9A 92 9A
  34+ 9ADF 9C 9A A6 9A
  34+ 9AE3 AD 9A C0 9A
  34+ 9AE7 CC 9A
  35+ 9AE9              RankingNameIdxLen EQU $ - RankingNameIdx
  36+ 9AE9
  37+ 9AE9
  38+ 9AE9              getTableText:
  39+ 9AE9              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ 9AE9              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ 9AE9 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ 9AEA ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ 9AEC ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ 9AEE 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ 9AEF 23           	inc		hl
  46+ 9AF0 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ 9AF1 EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ 9AF2 D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ 9AF3 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ 9AF4
  51+ 9AF4
  52+ 9AF4              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ 9AF4              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ 9AF4              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ 9AF4              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ 9AF4              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ 9AF4              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ 9AF4              getRankIndex:
  59+ 9AF4              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ 9AF4              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ 9AF4 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ 9AF5 B3           	or		e
  63+ 9AF6 FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ 9AF8 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ 9AF9 AF           	xor 	a
  66+ 9AFA 21 48 9A     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ 9AFD              .testLoop:
  68+ 9AFD 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ 9AFE 23           	inc		hl
  70+ 9AFF 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ 9B00 E5           	push	hl
  72+ 9B01 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ 9B02 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ 9B03 CD C4 A4     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ 9B06 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ 9B08              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ 9B08 E1           	pop		hl
  78+ 9B09 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ 9B0A 23           	inc		hl
  80+ 9B0B 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ 9B0C 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ 9B0E              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ 9B0E E1           	pop		hl
  84+ 9B0F C9           	ret
  85+ 9B10
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

# file opened: ./Tables/dictionary.asm

 181+ 9F91              CapitaliseString:
 182+ 9F91              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ 9F91              .CapLoop:
 184+ 9F91 23           	inc		hl
 185+ 9F92 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ 9F93 FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ 9F95 C8           	ret		z
 188+ 9F96 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ 9F98 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ 9F9A FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ 9F9C 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ 9F9E              .LowerCase:
 193+ 9F9E C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ 9FA0 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ 9FA1 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop

 197+ 9FA3              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ 9FA3 21 14 9E     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ 9FA6 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ 9FA8 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ 9FAA D5           	push	de
 202+ 9FAB 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ 9FAC 23           	inc		hl
 204+ 9FAD 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ 9FAE EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ 9FAF D1           	pop		de
 207+ 9FB0 C9           	ret

 209+ 9FB1
 210+ 9FB1              expandTokenToString:
 211+ 9FB1              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ 9FB1 21 3A 9F     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ 9FB4 CD E9 9A     	call	getTableText
 214+ 9FB7 11 70 9F     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ 9FBA              .ReadLoop:
 216+ 9FBA 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ 9FBB FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ 9FBD 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ 9FBF E5           	push	hl
 220+ 9FC0 D5           	push	de
 221+ 9FC1 21 14 9E     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ 9FC4 CD E9 9A     	call	getTableText
 223+ 9FC7 D1           	pop		de
 224+ 9FC8              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ 9FC8 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ 9FC9 FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ 9FCB 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ 9FCD              ;.GetChar:
 229+ 9FCD 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ 9FCE 13           	inc		de
 231+ 9FCF 23           	inc		hl
 232+ 9FD0 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ 9FD2              .AddSpace:
 234+ 9FD2 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ 9FD4 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ 9FD5 13           	inc		de
 237+ 9FD6 E1           	pop		hl
 238+ 9FD7 23           	inc		hl
 239+ 9FD8 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ 9FDA              .ReadDone:
 241+ 9FDA 1B           	dec		de
 242+ 9FDB AF           	xor		a
 243+ 9FDC 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ 9FDD C9           	ret

 320+ A078              ;
 321+ A078              ;
# file closed: ./Tables/name_digrams.asm
 873  A078              ;INCLUDE "Tables/inwk_table.asm" This is no longer needed as we will write to univer object bank
 874  A078
 875  A078              ; Include all maths libraries to test assembly
 876  A078                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhldesigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhldesigned.asm
   1+ A078              addhldesigned:
   2+ A078 CB 7C                bit     7,h
   3+ A07A 20 03                jr      nz,.noneghl
   4+ A07C CD DA A4             call    negate16hl
   5+ A07F              .noneghl:
   6+ A07F CB 7A                bit     7,d
   7+ A081 20 03                jr      nz,.nonegde
   8+ A083 CD E1 A4             call    negate16de
   9+ A086              .nonegde:
  10+ A086 19                   add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
  11+ A087 AF                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
  12+ A088 CB 7C                bit     7,h
  13+ A08A C8                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
  14+ A08B CD DA A4             call    negate16hl
  15+ A08E 3E FF                ld      a,$FF
  16+ A090 C9                   ret
  17+ A091
# file closed: ./Maths/addhldesigned.asm
 877  A091                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhlasigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
   1+ A091
   2+ A091              ; a = value to add
   3+ A091              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
   4+ A091              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
   5+ A091              addINWKbasigned:
   6+ A091 21 0C C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
   7+ A094 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
   8+ A095 78           		ld		a,b
   9+ A096 ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
  10+ A098 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
  11+ A099 E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
  12+ A09B 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
  13+ A09C 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
  14+ A09D E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
  15+ A09F              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
  16+ A09F              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
  17+ A09F              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
  18+ A09F              addhlcsigned:
  19+ A09F 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
  20+ A0A0 23                   inc     hl
  21+ A0A1 56                   ld      d,(hl)
  22+ A0A2 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
  23+ A0A3 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
  24+ A0A4 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
  25+ A0A5 A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
  26+ A0A6 CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
  27+ A0A8 28 28                jr      z,.postivecalc
  28+ A0AA              .negativecalc:
  29+ A0AA 7C                   ld      a,h
  30+ A0AB E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A0AD 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
  32+ A0AE DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
  33+ A0B0 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
  34+ A0B2 ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ A0B4 DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
  36+ A0B6 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
  37+ A0B7 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
  38+ A0B8 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
  39+ A0BA DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
  40+ A0BC F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
  41+ A0BE A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
  42+ A0BF 77                   ld      (hl),a
  43+ A0C0 2B                   dec     hl
  44+ A0C1 72                   ld      (hl),d
  45+ A0C2 2B                   dec     hl
  46+ A0C3 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
  47+ A0C4 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
  48+ A0C5 D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
  49+ A0C6              .nocarry:
  50+ A0C6 CD DA A4             call    negate16hl                  ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
  51+ A0C9 B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
  52+ A0CA EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
  53+ A0CB 73                   ld      (hl),e
  54+ A0CC 23                   inc     hl
  55+ A0CD 72                   ld      (hl),d
  56+ A0CE 23                   inc     hl
  57+ A0CF 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
  58+ A0D0 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
  59+ A0D1 C9                   ret
  60+ A0D2              .postivecalc:
  61+ A0D2 DD 68                ld      ixl,b
  62+ A0D4 06 00                ld      b,0
  63+ A0D6 19                   add     hl,de
  64+ A0D7 EB                   ex      de,hl
  65+ A0D8 DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
  66+ A0DA 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
  67+ A0DB 2B                   dec     hl
  68+ A0DC 72                   ld      (hl),d
  69+ A0DD 2B                   dec     hl
  70+ A0DE 73                   ld      (hl),e
  71+ A0DF C9                   ret
  72+ A0E0
  73+ A0E0              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
  74+ A0E0              ;MVT1
  75+ A0E0              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
  76+ A0E0              ;    A = sign bit => T
  77+ A0E0              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
  78+ A0E0              ;    if negative thn its not an add
  79+ A0E0              ;
  80+ A0E0              ;        and h, 7F
  81+ A0E0              ;        b = 0
  82+ A0E0              ;        c = varS
  83+ A0E0              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
  84+ A0E0              ;        retain carry
  85+ A0E0              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
  86+ A0E0              ;        and 7F
  87+ A0E0              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
  88+ A0E0              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
  89+ A0E0              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
  90+ A0E0              ;
  91+ A0E0              ;    else
  92+ A0E0              ;MV10.
  93+ A0E0              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
  94+ A0E0              ;        or      sign bit
  95+ A0E0
  96+ A0E0
# file closed: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
 878  A0E0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm
   1+ A0E0              ; Note its big endian
   2+ A0E0 2A 92 97     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ A0E3 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ A0E4 22 92 97                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ A0E7 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ A0EA 2A 94 97                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ A0ED ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ A0EF 22 94 97                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ A0F2 C9                                   ret
  10+ A0F3
  11+ A0F3 2A 92 97     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ A0F6 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ A0F7 B5                                   or      l
  14+ A0F8 2A 94 97                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ A0FB B4                                   or      h
  16+ A0FC B5                                   or      l
  17+ A0FD C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ A0FE B7                                   or      a
  19+ A0FF 2A 92 97                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ A102 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ A104 22 92 97                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ A107 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ A10A 2A 94 97                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ A10D ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ A10F 22 94 97                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ A112                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ A112 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ A114 C2 18 A1    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ A117 C9                                   ret
  28+ A118 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ A11B 22 92 97                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ A11E 22 94 97                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ A121 C9                                   ret
  32+ A122
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm
 879  A122                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ A122              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ A122 2A AB 93                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ A125 3A AA 93                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ A128 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ A12A 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ A12D 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ A12E                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ A12E CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ A130 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ A132 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ A134 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ A136 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ A137 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ A138 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ A139              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ A139 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ A13B CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ A13D CB 20                                sla b
  15+ A13F 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ A141 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ A143 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ A144 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ A146 C9                                   ret
  20+ A147
  21+ A147
  22+ A147              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ A147 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ A147 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ A147 ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ A147 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ A147 ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ A147 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ A147 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ A147 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A147 ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ A147 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ A147 ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ A147 ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ A147 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ A147 ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ A147 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ A147 ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ A147                                      ENDM
  40+ A147
  41+ A147
  42+ A147
  43+ A147                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ A147              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ A147 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ A148 3A AA 93    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ A14B 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A14C AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ A14D E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ A14F 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ A150 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ A151 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A153 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ A154 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ A155 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A157 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A158 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ A15A 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ A15B B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ A15C 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ A15D 2A AB 93     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ A160 CD 69 A1                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ A163 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ A164                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ A164 B7          >                    or a
  49+ A165 DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ A167 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ A168 C9                                   ret
  52+ A169
  53+ A169
  54+ A169 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ A16A E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ A16C 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ A16D AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ A16E                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ A16E FA 86 A1    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ A171 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ A172 B2                                   or      d
  61+ A173                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ A173 FA 78 A1    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ A176 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ A177 C9                                   ret
  64+ A178 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ A179 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ A17B 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ A17C 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ A17D E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ A17F 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ A180 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ A181 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ A183 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ A184 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ A185 C9                                   ret
  75+ A186 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ A187 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ A189 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ A18A 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ A18B E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ A18D 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ A18E B7                                   or      a
  82+ A18F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ A191 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ A193 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ A194 B4                                   or      h
  86+ A195 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ A196 C9                                   ret
  88+ A197              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ A197 AF          >                    xor a
  88+ A198 95          >                    sub l
  88+ A199 6F          >                    ld l,a
  88+ A19A 9F          >                    sbc a,a
  88+ A19B 94          >                    sub h
  88+ A19C 67          >                    ld h,a
  89+ A19D 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ A19E EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ A1A0 B4                                   or      h
  92+ A1A1 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ A1A2 C9                                   ret
  94+ A1A3
  95+ A1A3
  96+ A1A3                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ A1A3                  ;
  98+ A1A3                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ A1A3                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ A1A3                  ;
 101+ A1A3                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ A1A3                  ;         carry reset
 103+ A1A3                  ;
 104+ A1A3                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ A1A3 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ A1A4 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ A1A5 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ A1A7 EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ A1A8 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ A1AA
 111+ A1AA 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ A1AB 85                                   add a,l
 113+ A1AC 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ A1AD EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ A1AE
 116+ A1AE 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ A1AF CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ A1B1 C9                                   ret
 119+ A1B2
 120+ A1B2
 121+ A1B2
 122+ A1B2                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ A1B2                 ;
 124+ A1B2                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ A1B2                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ A1B2                 ;
 127+ A1B2                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ A1B2                 ;         carry reset
 129+ A1B2                 ;
 130+ A1B2                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ A1B2
 132+ A1B2
 133+ A1B2
 134+ A1B2 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ A1B3 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ A1B4 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ A1B5 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ A1B6 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ A1B7 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ A1B8              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ A1B8 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ A1BA EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ A1BB ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ A1BD
 145+ A1BD AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ A1BE 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ A1BF 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ A1C0
 149+ A1C0 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ A1C1 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ A1C2 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ A1C4
 153+ A1C4 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ A1C5 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ A1C6
 156+ A1C6 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ A1C7 85                                   add a,l
 158+ A1C8 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ A1C9 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ A1CA
 161+ A1CA D1                                   pop de
 162+ A1CB ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ A1CD
 164+ A1CD EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ A1CE ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ A1D0 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ A1D1
 168+ A1D1 C9                                   ret
 169+ A1D2
 170+ A1D2              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ A1D2              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ A1D2              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ A1D2              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ A1D2              ;         carry reset
 175+ A1D2              ; maths is
 176+ A1D2              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ A1D2              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ A1D2              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ A1D2              ;
 180+ A1D2              ;
 181+ A1D2              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ A1D2 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ A1D3 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ A1D4 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ A1D5 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ A1D6 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ A1D7 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ A1D8 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ A1DA EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ A1DB ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ A1DD 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ A1DE 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ A1DF 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ A1E0 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ A1E2 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ A1E3 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ A1E4 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ A1E5 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ A1E6                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ A1E6 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ A1E7 C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ A1E8 C9                                   ret
 203+ A1E9
 204+ A1E9              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 205+ A1E9              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 206+ A1E9              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 207+ A1E9              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 208+ A1E9              ;         carry reset
 209+ A1E9              ;
 210+ A1E9              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 211+ A1E9 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 212+ A1EA AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 213+ A1EB 32 E9 A1                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 214+ A1EE 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 215+ A1EF ED 27 80                             test    $80
 216+ A1F2 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 217+ A1F4 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 218+ A1F6 57                                   ld      d,a
 219+ A1F7 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 220+ A1F9 32 E9 A1                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 221+ A1FC 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 222+ A1FD ED 27 80                             test    $80
 223+ A200 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 224+ A202 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 225+ A204 67                                   ld      h,a
 226+ A205 3A E9 A1                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 227+ A208 EE 80                                xor     $80
 228+ A20A 32 E9 A1                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 229+ A20D CD D2 A1     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 230+ A210 3A E9 A1     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 231+ A213 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 232+ A216 C8                                   ret     z
 233+ A217 AF           .Negateghl: 				xor 	a
 234+ A218 95                                   sub 	l
 235+ A219 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 236+ A21A 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 237+ A21B 94                                   sub 	h
 238+ A21C 67                                   ld 		h,a
 239+ A21D C9                                   ret
 240+ A21E
 241+ A21E AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 242+ A21F 32 E9 A1                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 243+ A222 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 244+ A223 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 245+ A226 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 246+ A228 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 247+ A22A 57                                   ld      d,a
 248+ A22B 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 249+ A22D 32 E9 A1                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 250+ A230 CD D2 A1     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 251+ A233 3A E9 A1     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 252+ A236 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 253+ A239 C8                                   ret     z
 254+ A23A AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 255+ A23B 95                                   sub 	l
 256+ A23C 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 257+ A23D 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 258+ A23E 94                                   sub 	h
 259+ A23F 67                                   ld 		h,a
 260+ A240 C9                                   ret
 261+ A241
 262+ A241
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
 880  A241                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ A241              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A241              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ A241
   4+ A241              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ A241 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ A241 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ A241 ~            			mul
   8+ A241              			ENDM
   9+ A241
  10+ A241              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ A241 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ A241 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ A241 ~            			mul
  14+ A241 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ A241              			ENDM
  16+ A241
  17+ A241
  18+ A241              asm_squa:
  19+ A241 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ A243              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ A243              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ A243              asm_squa2:
  23+ A243 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ A244 57           	ld d,a
  25+ A245 ED 30        	mul
  26+ A247 ED 53 4C 93  	ld (varP),de
  27+ A24B 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ A24C C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
 881  A24D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ A24D              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A24D              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ A24D              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ A24D              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ A24D              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ A24D              asm_sqrt:
   7+ A24D 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ A250 61           	ld h,c
   9+ A251 69           	ld l,c
  10+ A252              .sqrloop:
  11+ A252 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ A254 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ A256 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ A257 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A258 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ A25A 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ A25C EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ A25D 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ A25E 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ A260              .sqrbit:
  21+ A260 19           	add hl,de
  22+ A261 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ A262 B7           	or a
  24+ A263 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ A265              .sqrfi:
  26+ A265 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ A267 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ A269 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ A26B CB 19        	rr c
  30+ A26D 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ A26F C9           	ret
  32+ A270
  33+ A270
  34+ A270              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ A270 3A AA 93     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ A273 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ A274 3A AB 93     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ A277 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ A278 CD 4D A2     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ A27B 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ A27C 32 AA 93     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ A27F C9           	ret
  43+ A280
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 882  A280                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ A280              ; Divide 8-bit values
   2+ A280              ; In: Divide E by divider C
   3+ A280              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
   4+ A280              ;
   5+ A280              ;;;Div8:
   6+ A280              ;;;    xor a
   7+ A280              ;;;    ld b,8
   8+ A280              ;;;Div8_Loop:
   9+ A280              ;;;    rl e
  10+ A280              ;;;    rla
  11+ A280              ;;;    sub c
  12+ A280              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  13+ A280              ;;;    add a,c
  14+ A280              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  15+ A280              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  16+ A280              ;;;    ld b,a
  17+ A280              ;;;    ld a,e
  18+ A280              ;;;    rla
  19+ A280              ;;;    cpl
  20+ A280              ;;;    ret
  21+ A280
  22+ A280              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  23+ A280              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  24+ A280              ;;         A is a copy of E
  25+ A280              ;;         HL is the remainder
  26+ A280              ;;         BC is not changed
  27+ A280              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  28+ A280              ;140 bytes
  29+ A280              ;145cc
  30+ A280
  31+ A280              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  32+ A280 ~                                rla
  33+ A280 ~                                adc     hl,hl
  34+ A280 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ A280 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
  36+ A280 ~                                add     hl,bc
  37+ A280                                  ENDM
  38+ A280
  39+ A280              DEequDEDivBC:
  40+ A280 AF               xor a
  41+ A281 ED 62            sbc hl,hl
  42+ A283 7A               ld a,d
  43+ A284                  MacroDEDivBC
  43+ A284 17          >                    rla
  43+ A285 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  43+ A287 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  43+ A289 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  43+ A28B 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  44+ A28C                  MacroDEDivBC
  44+ A28C 17          >                    rla
  44+ A28D ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  44+ A28F ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  44+ A291 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  44+ A293 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  45+ A294                  MacroDEDivBC
  45+ A294 17          >                    rla
  45+ A295 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  45+ A297 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  45+ A299 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  45+ A29B 09          >                    add     hl,bc

  63+ A300 17          >                    rla
  63+ A301 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  63+ A303 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  63+ A305 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  63+ A307 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  64+ A308 17               rla
  65+ A309 2F               cpl
  66+ A30A 5F               ld e,a
  67+ A30B C9               ret
  68+ A30C
  69+ A30C
  70+ A30C
  71+ A30C              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  72+ A30C              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  73+ A30C              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  74+ A30C              ; Our use
  75+ A30C              ; BC = A0
  76+ A30C              ; DE = 0C
  77+ A30C              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
  78+ A30C              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
  78+ A30C B9          >                        cp     c
  78+ A30D D2 38 A3    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
  79+ A310 47                                   ld      b,a
  80+ A311 59                                   ld      e,c
  81+ A312 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  82+ A314 16 00                                ld      d,0
  83+ A316 C3 23 A3                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
  84+ A319 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
  85+ A31A 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  86+ A31C 21 AA 93                             ld      hl,varQ
  87+ A31F 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  88+ A320 16 00                                ld      d,0
  89+ A322 5F                                   ld      e,a
  90+ A323              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
  91+ A323 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
  92+ A326 78                                   ld      a,b
  93+ A327 06 10                                ld      b,16
  94+ A329 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
  95+ A32B 17                                   rla			; ...
  96+ A32C ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
  97+ A32E ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
  98+ A330 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  99+ A332 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 100+ A333 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 101+ A334 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 102+ A336 47                                   ld   b,a
 103+ A337 C9                                   ret
 104+ A338 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 105+ A33B C9                                   ret
 106+ A33C
 107+ A33C              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 108+ A33C 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 109+ A33E AF                                   xor a
 110+ A33F CB 21        div8_loop:	            sla c
 111+ A341 17                                   rla
 112+ A342 BA                                   cp d
 113+ A343 38 02                                jr c,div8_skip
 113+ A345
 114+ A345 0C                                   inc c
 115+ A346 92                                   sub d
 116+ A347 10 F6        div8_skip:	            djnz div8_loop
 117+ A349 C9                                   ret
 118+ A34A              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 119+ A34A 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 120+ A34C AF                                   xor a
 121+ A34D CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 122+ A34F CB 14                                rl	h
 123+ A351              ;    add hl,hl
 124+ A351 17                                   rla
 125+ A352 B9                                   cp c
 126+ A353 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 127+ A355 2C                                   inc l
 128+ A356 91                                   sub c
 129+ A357 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 130+ A359 C9                                   ret
 131+ A35A              ;
 132+ A35A              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 133+ A35A              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 134+ A35A              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 135+ A35A              ;
 136+ A35A              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 137+ A35A ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 138+ A35A ~            					rla				; ...
 139+ A35A ~            					cp	c			; ...
 140+ A35A ~            					jr	1F
 141+ A35A ~            					sub	c			; ...
 142+ A35A ~            1:
 143+ A35A ~            					inc	l			; ...
 144+ A35A              					ENDM
 145+ A35A
 146+ A35A
 147+ A35A
 148+ A35A              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 149+ A35A 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 150+ A35D 78                               ld a,b
 151+ A35E 06 08                            ld b,8
 152+ A360 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 153+ A361 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 154+ A363 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 155+ A365 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 156+ A367 19                               add hl,de
 157+ A368 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 158+ A36A 17                               rla
 159+ A36B 2F                               cpl
 160+ A36C 47                               ld b,a
 161+ A36D 79                               ld a,c
 162+ A36E 48                               ld c,b
 163+ A36F 06 08                            ld b,8
 164+ A371 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 165+ A372 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 166+ A374 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 167+ A376 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 168+ A378 19                               add hl,de
 169+ A379 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 170+ A37B 17                               rla
 171+ A37C 2F                               cpl
 172+ A37D 41                               ld b,c
 173+ A37E 4F                               ld c,a
 174+ A37F C9                               ret
 175+ A380
 176+ A380
 177+ A380
 178+ A380              BCDIVDE_Iteration: MACRO
 179+ A380 ~            				   rla
 180+ A380 ~            				   adc	hl,hl
 181+ A380 ~            				   add	hl,de
 182+ A380 ~            				   jr	c,1F
 183+ A380 ~            				   sbc	hl,de
 184+ A380 ~            1:
 185+ A380              				   ENDM
 186+ A380
 187+ A380
 188+ A380              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 189+ A380              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 190+ A380              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 191+ A380              ;min: 738cc
 192+ A380              ;max: 898cc
 193+ A380              ;avg: 818cc
 194+ A380              ;144 bytes
 195+ A380 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 196+ A381 67                                   ld h,a
 197+ A382 6F                                   ld l,a
 198+ A383 93                                   sub e
 199+ A384 5F                                   ld e,a
 200+ A385 9F                                   sbc a,a
 201+ A386 92                                   sub d
 202+ A387 57                                   ld d,a
 203+ A388 78                                   ld a,b

 223+ A407 19          >				   add	hl,de
 223+ A408 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 223+ A40A ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 223+ A40C             >1:
 224+ A40C 17                                   rla
 225+ A40D 4F                                   ld c,a
 226+ A40E C9                                   ret
 227+ A40F
 228+ A40F              ;Inputs:
 229+ A40F              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 230+ A40F              ;Outputs:
 231+ A40F              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 232+ A40F              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 233+ A40F              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 234+ A40F              ;Otherwise:
 235+ A40F              ;min: 1107cc
 236+ A40F              ;max: 1319cc
 237+ A40F              ;avg: 1201cc
 238+ A40F 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 239+ A410 AA                                   xor d
 240+ A411 F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 241+ A412              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 242+ A412 A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 243+ A413 F2 1C A4                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 244+ A416 AF                                   xor a
 245+ A417 91                                   sub c
 246+ A418 4F                                   ld c,a
 247+ A419 9F                                   sbc a,a
 248+ A41A 90                                   sub b
 249+ A41B 47                                   ld b,a
 250+ A41C 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 251+ A41D B2                                   or d
 252+ A41E FA 27 A4                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 253+ A421 AF                                   xor a
 254+ A422 93                                   sub e
 255+ A423 5F                                   ld e,a
 256+ A424 9F                                   sbc a,a
 257+ A425 92                                   sub d
 258+ A426 57                                   ld d,a
 259+ A427 B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 260+ A428 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 261+ A42A 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 262+ A42C 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 263+ A42D 83                                   add a,e
 264+ A42E 7A                                   ld a,d
 265+ A42F 8C                                   adc a,h
 266+ A430 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 267+ A432 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 268+ A433 79                                   ld a,c
 269+ A434 CD 4F A4                             call div_fixed88_sub
 270+ A437 4F                                   ld c,a
 271+ A438 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 272+ A439 CD 4F A4                             call div_fixed88_sub
 273+ A43C 51                                   ld d,c
 274+ A43D 5F                                   ld e,a
 275+ A43E F1                                   pop af
 276+ A43F F0                                   ret p
 277+ A440 AF                                   xor a
 278+ A441 93                                   sub e
 279+ A442 5F                                   ld e,a
 280+ A443 9F                                   sbc a,a
 281+ A444 92                                   sub d
 282+ A445 57                                   ld d,a
 283+ A446 C9                                   ret
 284+ A447
 285+ A447 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 286+ A44A F1                                   pop af
 287+ A44B F0                                   ret p
 288+ A44C 13                                   inc de
 289+ A44D 1C                                   inc e
 290+ A44E C9                                   ret
 291+ A44F
 292+ A44F              ;min: 456cc
 293+ A44F              ;max: 536cc
 294+ A44F              ;avg: 496cc
 295+ A44F 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 296+ A451 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 297+ A452 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 298+ A454 19                                   add hl,de
 299+ A455 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 300+ A457 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 301+ A459 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 302+ A45B 8F                                   adc a,a
 303+ A45C C9                                   ret
 304+ A45D
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 883  A45D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ A45D              asm_tis2:
   2+ A45D              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ A45D              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ A45D F5           	push af
   5+ A45E E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ A460 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ A461 3A AA 93     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ A464 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ A465 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ A466 BB           	cp e
  11+ A467 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ A469 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ A46B ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ A46D EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A46E 3A AA 93     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ A471 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ A472 CD 4A A3     	call asm_div16
  18+ A475 F1           	pop af
  19+ A476 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ A478 B5           	or l
  21+ A479 C9           	ret
  22+ A47A              .tis2_set96:
  23+ A47A F1           	pop af
  24+ A47B E6 80        	and $80
  25+ A47D F6 96        	or $96
  26+ A47F C9           	ret
  27+ A480
  28+ A480
  29+ A480              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ A480              squareregfx:
  31+ A480 3A 78 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ A483 57           	ld d,a
  33+ A484 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ A485 ED 30        	mul
  35+ A487 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ A488              squareregfy:
  37+ A488 3A 7A C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ A48B 57           	ld d,a
  39+ A48C 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ A48D ED 30        	mul
  41+ A48F 19           	add hl,de
  42+ A490              squareregfz:
  43+ A490 3A 7C C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ A493 57           	ld d,a
  45+ A494 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ A495 ED 30        	mul
  47+ A497 19           	add hl,de
  48+ A498 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ A499              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ A499 CD 4D A2     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ A49C E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ A49D E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ A49E E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ A49F              normfx:
  55+ A49F 3A 78 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ A4A2 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ A4A3 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ A4A4 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ A4A5 CD 5D A4     	call asm_tis2
  60+ A4A8 32 78 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ A4AB              normfy:
  62+ A4AB 3A 7A C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ A4AE E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ A4AF 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ A4B0 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ A4B1 CD 5D A4     	call asm_tis2
  67+ A4B4 32 7A C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ A4B7              normfz:
  69+ A4B7 3A 7C C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ A4BA E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ A4BB 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ A4BC 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ A4BD CD 5D A4     	call asm_tis2
  74+ A4C0 32 7C C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ A4C3              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ A4C3 C9           	ret
  77+ A4C4
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 884  A4C4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ A4C4              ; Input:
   2+ A4C4              ;       HL = 1st value
   3+ A4C4              ;       DE = 2nd value
   4+ A4C4              ; Output:
   5+ A4C4              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   6+ A4C4              ;
   7+ A4C4              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   8+ A4C4              ;               -----------------------------------
   9+ A4C4              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  10+ A4C4              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  11+ A4C4              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  12+ A4C4              ;               1       1       Impossible
  13+ A4C4              ;
  14+ A4C4
  15+ A4C4 E5           compare16HLDE:      push    hl
  16+ A4C5 A7                               and     a
  17+ A4C6 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  18+ A4C8 E1                               pop     hl
  19+ A4C9 C9                               ret
  20+ A4CA
  21+ A4CA              ; With compare signed we do ABS comparison
  22+ A4CA              ; this is used for view ports as we just want to know if its +/- out side of 90 degrees
  23+ A4CA
  24+ A4CA E5 D5        compare16HLDEABS:   push    hl,,de
  25+ A4CC 7C                               ld      a,h                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  26+ A4CD E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  27+ A4CF 67                               ld      h,a
  28+ A4D0 7A                               ld      a,d                                     ; Quick pass see of both the same sign
  29+ A4D1 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit
  30+ A4D3 57                               ld      d,a
  31+ A4D4 A7                               and     a
  32+ A4D5 ED 52                            sbc     hl,de
  33+ A4D7 D1 E1                            pop     hl,,de
  34+ A4D9 C9                               ret
  35+ A4DA
  36+ A4DA
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 885  A4DA                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ A4DA              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ A4DA              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ A4DA              negate16:
   4+ A4DA              negate16hl:
   5+ A4DA                      ; Input:
   6+ A4DA                      ;       HL = value
   7+ A4DA                      ; Output:
   8+ A4DA                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ A4DA                      ; Destroys:
  10+ A4DA                      ;       AF
  11+ A4DA                      ;
  12+ A4DA AF           	xor 	a
  13+ A4DB 95           	sub 	l
  14+ A4DC 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ A4DD 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ A4DE 94           	sub 	h
  17+ A4DF 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ A4E0 C9           	ret
  19+ A4E1
  20+ A4E1              negate16de:
  21+ A4E1 AF           	xor 	a
  22+ A4E2 93           	sub 	e
  23+ A4E3 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ A4E4 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ A4E5 92           	sub 	d
  26+ A4E6 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ A4E7 C9           	ret
  28+ A4E8
  29+ A4E8              negate16bc:
  30+ A4E8 AF           	xor 	a
  31+ A4E9 91           	sub 	c
  32+ A4EA 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ A4EB 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ A4EC 90           	sub 	b
  35+ A4ED 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ A4EE C9           	ret
  37+ A4EF
  38+ A4EF
  39+ A4EF              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ A4EF ~            					xor 	a
  41+ A4EF ~            					sub 	l
  42+ A4EF ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ A4EF ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ A4EF ~            					sub 	h
  45+ A4EF ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ A4EF              					ENDM
  47+ A4EF
  48+ A4EF              macronegate16de:	MACRO
  49+ A4EF ~            					xor 	a
  50+ A4EF ~                                sub 	e
  51+ A4EF ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ A4EF ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ A4EF ~                                sub 	d
  54+ A4EF ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ A4EF              					ENDM
  56+ A4EF              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ A4EF ~            					xor 	a
  58+ A4EF ~                                sub 	c
  59+ A4EF ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ A4EF ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ A4EF ~                                sub 	b
  62+ A4EF ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ A4EF              					ENDM
  64+ A4EF
  65+ A4EF              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
