  67+ A4EF ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ A4EF ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ A4EF ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ A4EF ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ A4EF ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ A4EF              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
 886  A4EF                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ A4EF DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ A4F1                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ A4F1 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ A4F2 D2 07 A5    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ A4F5 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ A4F6 CD 3C A3                             call		asm_div8
   5+ A4F9 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ A4FA CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ A4FC 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ A4FD CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ A4FF 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ A500 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ A501 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ A503 E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ A505 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ A506 C9                                   ret
  15+ A507              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ A507              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ A507 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ A509 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ A50B F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ A50D C9                                   ret
  21+ A50E
  22+ A50E
  23+ A50E
  24+ A50E
  25+ A50E              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ A50E                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ A50E 3A 78 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ A511 DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ A513 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ A515              N96SQX:
  31+ A515              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ A515 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ A516 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ A517 ED 30       >			mul
  32+ A519 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ A51A 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ A51B              N96SQY:
  35+ A51B 3A 79 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ A51E DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ A520 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ A522              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ A522 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ A523 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ A524 ED 30       >			mul
  39+ A526 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ A527              N96SQZ:
  41+ A527 3A 7A C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ A52A FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ A52C E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ A52E              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ A52E 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ A52F 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ A530 ED 30       >			mul
  45+ A532              N96SQADD:
  46+ A532 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ A533 EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ A534              N96SQRT:
  49+ A534 CD 4D A2     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ A537              N96NORMX:
  51+ A537 3A 78 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ A53A E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ A53C 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ A53D 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ A53E CD 1B A7     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ A541 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ A542 DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ A544 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ A546 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ A547 32 78 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ A54A              N96NORMY:
  62+ A54A 3A 79 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ A54D E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ A54F 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ A550 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ A551 CD 1B A7     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ A554 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ A555 DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ A557 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ A559 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ A55A 32 79 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ A55D              N96NORMZ:
  73+ A55D 3A 7A C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ A560 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ A562 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ A563 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ A564 CD 1B A7     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ A567 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ A568 FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ A56A E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ A56C B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ A56D 32 7A C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ A570 C9           	ret
  84+ A571
  85+ A571              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  86+ A571 3A 78 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  87+ A574                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  87+ A574 5F          >			ld	e,a
  87+ A575 57          >			ld  d,a
  87+ A576 ED 30       >			mul
  88+ A578 7A                                   ld		a,d
  89+ A579 32 AB 93                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  90+ A57C 7B                                   ld		a,e
  91+ A57D 32 AA 93                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
  92+ A580 32 4C 93                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
  93+ A583 3A 79 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
  94+ A586                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  94+ A586 5F          >			ld	e,a
  94+ A587 57          >			ld  d,a
  94+ A588 ED 30       >			mul
  95+ A58A 7A                                   ld		a,d
  96+ A58B 32 C8 93                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
  97+ A58E 7B                                   ld		a,e
  98+ A58F 32 4C 93                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
  99+ A592 21 AA 93                             ld		hl,varQ
 100+ A595 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 101+ A596 32 AA 93                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 102+ A599 3A C8 93                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 103+ A59C 21 AB 93                             ld		hl,varR
 104+ A59F 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 105+ A5A0 32 AB 93                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 106+ A5A3 3A 7A C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 107+ A5A6                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 107+ A5A6 5F          >			ld	e,a
 107+ A5A7 57          >			ld  d,a
 107+ A5A8 ED 30       >			mul
 108+ A5AA 7A                                   ld		a,d
 109+ A5AB 32 C8 93                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 110+ A5AE 7B                                   ld		a,e
 111+ A5AF 32 4C 93                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 112+ A5B2 21 AA 93                             ld		hl,varQ
 113+ A5B5 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 114+ A5B6 32 AA 93                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 115+ A5B9 3A C8 93                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 116+ A5BC 21 AB 93                             ld		hl,varR
 117+ A5BF 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 118+ A5C0 32 AB 93                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 119+ A5C3 CD 70 A2                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 120+ A5C6 3A 78 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 121+ A5C9 CD 15 A7                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 122+ A5CC 32 78 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 123+ A5CF 3A 79 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 124+ A5D2 CD 15 A7                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 125+ A5D5 32 79 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 126+ A5D8 3A 79 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 127+ A5DB CD 15 A7                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 128+ A5DE 32 79 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 129+ A5E1 C9                                   ret
 130+ A5E2
 131+ A5E2
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 887  A5E2                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ A5E2              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ A5E2              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ A5E2              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ A5E2              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ A5E2              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ A5E2              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ A5E2              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ A5E2 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ A5E5 CD FB A5     	call	Num1
  10+ A5E8 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ A5EB CD FB A5     	call	Num1
  12+ A5EE 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ A5F1 CD FB A5     	call	Num1
  14+ A5F4 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ A5F6 CD FB A5     	call	Num1
  16+ A5F9 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ A5FB              Num1:
  18+ A5FB 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ A5FD              .Num2:
  20+ A5FD 3C           	inc	a
  21+ A5FE 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ A5FF 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ A601 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ A603 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ A604 13           	inc	de
  26+ A605 C9           	ret
  27+ A606
  28+ A606              DispAtoDE:
  29+ A606 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ A608 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ A609 C3 E2 A5     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ A60C
  33+ A60C              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ A60C 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ A60E 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ A60F 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ A612 CD 22 A6     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ A615 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ A617 CD FB A5     	call	Num1
  40+ A61A 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ A61C 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ A61D 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ A61E 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ A620 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ A622              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ A622 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ A624              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ A624 3C           	inc	a
  49+ A625 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ A626 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ A628 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ A62A 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ A62C              .Blank:
  54+ A62C 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ A62E              .DontBlank:
  56+ A62E ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ A630 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ A631 13           	inc	de
  59+ A632 C9           	ret
  60+ A633
  61+ A633              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ A633 FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ A635 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ A637 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ A639 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ A63A 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ A63D CD 49 A6     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ A640 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ A642 CD 49 A6     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ A645 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ A647 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ A649              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ A649 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ A64B              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ A64B 3C           	inc	a
  76+ A64C 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ A64D 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ A64F FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ A651 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ A653              .Blank:
  81+ A653 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ A655              .DontBlank:
  83+ A655 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ A657 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ A658 13           	inc	de
  86+ A659 C9           	ret
  87+ A65A              .NoStock:
  88+ A65A 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ A65C 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ A65D 13           	inc	de
  91+ A65E 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ A65F 13           	inc	de
  93+ A660 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ A662 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ A663 13           	inc de
  96+ A664 C9           	ret
  97+ A665
  98+ A665
  99+ A665              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ A665              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ A665              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ A665              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ A665 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ A669 0A 00 00 00
 103+ A66D 64 00 00 00
 103+ A671 E8 03 00 00
 103+ A675 10 27 00 00
 104+ A679 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ A67D 40 42 0F 00
 104+ A681 80 96 98 00
 104+ A685 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ A689 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ A68D 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ A691
 107+ A691              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ A691 CD A0 A6     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ A694 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ A697 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ A69A 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ A69C FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ A69F C9                                   ret
 114+ A6A0
 115+ A6A0 DD 22 8D A6  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ A6A4 ED 53 8F A6                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ A6A8 DD 21 89 A6                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ A6AC 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ A6AE 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ A6B0 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ A6B2 B7                                   or a
 122+ A6B3 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ A6B6 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ A6B9 2A 8D A6                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ A6BC ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ A6BE 22 8D A6                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ A6C1 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ A6C4 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ A6C7 2A 8F A6                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ A6CA ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ A6CC 22 8F A6                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ A6CF 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ A6D1 0C                                   inc c
 134+ A6D2 3C                                   inc a
 135+ A6D3 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ A6D5 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ A6D8 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ A6DB 2A 8D A6                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ A6DE 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ A6DF 22 8D A6                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ A6E2 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ A6E5 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ A6E8 2A 8F A6                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ A6EB ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ A6ED 22 8F A6                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ A6F0 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ A6F3 DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ A6F5 0C                                   inc c
 149+ A6F6 0D                                   dec c
 150+ A6F7 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ A6F9 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ A6FC FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ A6FE 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ A700 3A 8D A6                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ A703 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ A705 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ A708 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ A70C C9                                   ret
 159+ A70D
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
 888  A70D              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
 889  A70D              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
 890  A70D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ A70D
   2+ A70D              ; USES 			A DE BC
   3+ A70D              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
   4+ A70D              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
   5+ A70D CB 7F        	bit			7,a
   6+ A70F 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
   7+ A711 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
   8+ A713 CB FF        	set			7,a
   9+ A715              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  10+ A715              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  11+ A715              TIS2:
  12+ A715 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  13+ A716 3A AA 93     	ld			a,(varQ)
  14+ A719 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  15+ A71A 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  16+ A71B              AequAdivDmul96:
  17+ A71B 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  18+ A71C E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  19+ A71E              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  19+ A71E BA          >                        cp     d
  19+ A71F D2 3F A7    >                        jp		nc,TIS2AccGTEQ
  20+ A722 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  21+ A724              TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  22+ A724 CB 27        	sla			a
  23+ A726              	JumpIfALTNusng d,TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  23+ A726 BA          >                        cp      d
  23+ A727 DA 45 A7    >                        jp		c, TIS2SkipSub
  24+ A72A 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  25+ A72B 37           	scf
  26+ A72C CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  27+ A72E 38 F4        	jr			c,TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  28+ A730              TIS2SKIPCont:
  29+ A730 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  30+ A731 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  31+ A733 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  32+ A735 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  33+ A736 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  34+ A738 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  35+ A739 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  36+ A73A 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  37+ A73B E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  38+ A73D B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  39+ A73E C9           	ret
  40+ A73F              TIS2AccGTEQ:
  41+ A73F              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  42+ A73F 79           	ld			a,c
  43+ A740 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  44+ A742 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  45+ A744 C9           	ret
  46+ A745              TIS2SkipSub:
  47+ A745 B7           	or			a
  48+ A746 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ A748 38 DA        	jr			c,TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ A74A C3 30 A7     	jp			TIS2SKIPCont
  51+ A74D
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 891  A74D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ A74D              fmltu:
   2+ A74D              AequAmulQdiv256:
   3+ A74D              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   4+ A74D 57           	ld	d,a
   5+ A74E 3A AA 93     	ld	a,(varQ)
   6+ A751 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ A752 ED 30        	mul
   8+ A754 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   9+ A755 C9           	ret
  10+ A756
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
 892  A756                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ A756              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ A756              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ A756 21 95 96     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ A759 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ A75B ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ A75D 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ A75E C3 6A A7     		jp		DV41
   8+ A761              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ A761 21 95 96     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ A764 3A 3A 93     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ A767 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ A769 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ A76A              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ A76A 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ A76B 3A A6 93     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ A76E              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ A76E 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ A770 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ A772 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ A773 AF           		xor		a
  21+ A774              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ A774 CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ A776 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ A778 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ A779 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ A77B              DV8:
  27+ A77B 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ A77C 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ A77D              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ A77D CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ A77F 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ A781              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ A781              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ A781 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ A783 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ A784              .RollRemainder:
  37+ A784 CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ A786 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ A788 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ A789 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ A78B              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ A78B 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ A78C              .DontSBC:
  44+ A78C CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ A78E 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ A790 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ A791 32 AB 93     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ A794 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ A795 32 4C 93     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ A798 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ A799              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ A799 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ A79A 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ A79B CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ A79D 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ A79F 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ A7A0 32 AB 93     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ A7A3 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ A7A4 32 4C 93     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ A7A7 C9           		ret
  61+ A7A8              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ A7A8 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ A7AA 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ A7AB 32 AB 93     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ A7AE 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ A7AF 32 4C 93     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ A7B2 C9           		ret
  68+ A7B3
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
 893  A7B3                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ A7B3
   2+ A7B3              asm_defmutl:
   3+ A7B3              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ A7B3              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ A7B3 ED 30        	mul
   6+ A7B5 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ A7B6 C9           	ret
   8+ A7B7
   9+ A7B7
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
 894  A7B7              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
 895  A7B7              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
 896  A7B7              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
 897  A7B7                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ A7B7              APequQmulA:
   2+ A7B7              asm_mult1:
   3+ A7B7              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ A7B7 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ A7B9 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ A7BB 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ A7BC 3A AA 93     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ A7BF 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ A7C0 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ A7C2 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ A7C4 AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ A7C5 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ A7C7 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ A7C8 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ A7C9 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ A7CB 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ A7CC 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ A7CD E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ A7CF 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ A7D0 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ A7D2 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ A7D3 32 4C 93     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ A7D6 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ A7D7 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ A7D8 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ A7D9 C9           	ret
  27+ A7DA              .mul0:
  28+ A7DA AF           	xor	a
  29+ A7DB 32 4C 93     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ A7DE 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ A7DF 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ A7E0 C9           	ret
  33+ A7E1
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 898  A7E1                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ A7E1              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ A7E1              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ A7E1              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ A7E1              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ A7E1              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ A7E1              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ A7E1              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ A7E1              LL38:
   9+ A7E1              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ A7E1              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ A7E1              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ A7E1              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ A7E1              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ A7E1              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ A7E1              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ A7E1              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ A7E1              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ A7E1              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ A7E1              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ A7E1              ;	ret
  21+ A7E1              ; calculation table
  22+ A7E1              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ A7E1              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ A7E1              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ A7E1              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ A7E1              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ A7E1              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ A7E1              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ A7E1              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ A7E1              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ A7E1
  32+ A7E1              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ A7E1              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ A7E1              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ A7E1              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ A7E1
  37+ A7E1
  38+ A7E1              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ A7E1 21 AC 93     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ A7E4 AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ A7E5 FA F0 A7     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ A7E8 3A AA 93     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ A7EB 21 AB 93     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ A7EE 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ A7EF C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ A7F0              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ A7F0 3A AB 93     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ A7F3 21 AA 93     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ A7F6              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ A7F6              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ A7F6 B7          >                    or a
  51+ A7F7 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ A7F8 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ A7FA              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ A7FA              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ A7FA              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ A7FA C9           	ret
  57+ A7FB              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ A7FB FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ A7FD 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ A7FF ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ A801 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ A802 3A AC 93     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ A805 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ A807 32 AC 93     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ A80A 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ A80B                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ A80B B7          >                    or a
  67+ A80C C9           	ret
  68+ A80D              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ A80D 32 AC 93         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ A810                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ A810 B7          >                    or a
  71+ A811 C9               ret
  72+ A812              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ A812              ;--	push	bc
  74+ A812              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ A812              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ A812              ;--	sub		b
  77+ A812              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ A812              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ A812              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ A812              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ A812              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ A812              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ A812              ;--	ret
  84+ A812
  85+ A812              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ A812              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ A812              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ A812              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ A812              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ A812              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ A812              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ A812              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ A812              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ A812              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ A812              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ A812              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ A812              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ A812              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ A812              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ A812              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ A812              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ A812              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ A812              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ A812              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ A812              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ A812              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ A812              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ A812              ;;;;	ret
 109+ A812              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ A812              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ A812              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ A812              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ A812              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ A812              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ A812              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ A812              ;;;;	ret
 117+ A812              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ A812              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ A812              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ A812              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ A812              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ A812              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ A812              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ A812              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ A812              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ A812              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ A812              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ A812              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ A812              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ A812              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ A812              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ A812              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ A812              ;;;;	ret
 134+ A812              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ A812              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ A812              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ A812              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ A812              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ A812              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ A812              ;;;;	ret
 141+ A812
 142+ A812

   2+ A812              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ A812              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed

   6+ A812              moveship4Yreg:

   8+ A815 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ A816              moveship4breg:

  11+ A816              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:

  13+ A816 3A 66 93     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ A819 32 AA 93     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha

  31+ A836 CD 47 A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y

   1+ A8A2              ;;;LL28:
   2+ A8A2              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ A8A2              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ A8A2              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ A8A2              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ A8A2              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ A8A2              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ A8A2              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ A8A2              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ A8A2              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ A8A2              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ A8A2              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ A8A2              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ A8A2              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ A8A2              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ A8A2              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ A8A2              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ A8A2              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ A8A2              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ A8A2              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ A8A2              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ A8A2              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ A8A2              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ A8A2              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ A8A2              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ A8A2              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ A8A2              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ A8A2              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ A8A2              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ A8A2              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ A8A2              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ A8A2              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ A8A2              ;;;	ret
  34+ A8A2              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ A8A2              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ A8A2              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ A8A2              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ A8A2              ;;;	ret
  39+ A8A2
  40+ A8A2              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ A8A2 59             ld    e,c
  42+ A8A3 67             ld    h,a
  43+ A8A4 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ A8A6              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ A8A6 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ A8A7 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ A8A8 C8             ret z
  48+ A8A9 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ A8AC 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ A8AE              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ A8AE ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ A8B0 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ A8B1 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ A8B3 C9             ret
  55+ A8B4
  56+ A8B4              HL_Div_C:
  57+ A8B4              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ A8B4              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ A8B4              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ A8B4 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ A8B6 AF                   xor a
  62+ A8B7              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ A8B7 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ A8B8 17                   rla
  65+ A8B9 B9                   cp c
  66+ A8BA 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ A8BC 91                   sub c
  68+ A8BD 2C                   inc l
  69+ A8BE              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ A8BE 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ A8C0 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ A8C1 32 AB 93             ld  (varR),a
  73+ A8C4 C9                   ret
  74+ A8C5
  75+ A8C5
  76+ A8C5
  77+ A8C5              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ A8C5              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ A8C5              BFRDIV:
  80+ A8C5 F5           		push	af
  81+ A8C6 3A AA 93     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ A8C9 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ A8CA F1           		pop		af
  84+ A8CB FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ A8CD CA E4 A8     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ A8D0              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ A8D0 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ A8D2 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ A8D3              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ A8D3 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ A8D5 AF           		xor a
  92+ A8D6              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ A8D6 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ A8D7 17           		rla
  95+ A8D8 B9           		cp c
  96+ A8D9 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ A8DB 2C           		inc l
  98+ A8DC 91           		sub c
  99+ A8DD              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ A8DD 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ A8DF 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ A8E0 32 AB 93     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ A8E3 C9           		ret
 104+ A8E4              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ A8E4 32 AB 93     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ A8E7 C9           		ret
 107+ A8E8              ;	push	af
 108+ A8E8              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ A8E8              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ A8E8              ;	pop		af
 111+ A8E8              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ A8E8              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ A8E8              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ A8E8              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ A8E8              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ A8E8              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ A8E8              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ A8E8              ;	sla		a
 119+ A8E8              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ A8E8              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ A8E8              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ A8E8              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ A8E8              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ A8E8              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ A8E8              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ A8E8              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ A8E8              ;	scf
 128+ A8E8              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ A8E8              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ A8E8              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ A8E8              ;LL2:
 132+ A8E8              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ A8E8              ;LL2Good:
 134+ A8E8              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ A8E8              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ A8E8              ;	ret
 137+ A8E8
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
 905  A8E8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ A8E8              RequAdivQ:
   2+ A8E8              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ A8E8              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ A8E8 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ A8E9 3A AA 93     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ A8EC FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ A8EE 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ A8F0 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ A8F1 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ A8F3 AF               xor a
  11+ A8F4              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ A8F4 CB 21            sla c
  13+ A8F6 17               rla
  14+ A8F7 BA               cp d
  15+ A8F8 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ A8FA 0C               inc c
  17+ A8FB 92               sub d
  18+ A8FC              LL64:
  19+ A8FC 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ A8FE 32 A9 93     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ A901 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ A902 32 AB 93     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ A905 C9               ret
  24+ A906              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ A906 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ A908 32 AB 93     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ A90B 32 A9 93     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ A90E C9           	ret
  29+ A90F
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
 906  A90F              ;    INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RSequABSrs-LL129.asm"
 907  A90F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RSequQmulA-MULT12.asm
   1+ A90F              asm_mult12:
   2+ A90F              RSequQmulA:
   3+ A90F              ; "asm_ult12  R.S = Q * A \ visited quite often S = hi, R = lo, odd that its opposite to mult1"
   4+ A90F CD B7 A7     	call APequQmulA
   5+ A912 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ A913 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ A914 32 AC 93     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ A917 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ A918 32 AB 93     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ A91B 08           	ex 	af,af'
  11+ A91C C9           	ret
  12+ A91D

  32+ A98F
  33+ A98F              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ A98F              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ A98F              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ A98F 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ A990 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ A991 32 AA 93     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ A994 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ A995 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ A997 CD 47 A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ A99A              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ A99A              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ A99A              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ A99A 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ A99B E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ A99D 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ A99E 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ A99F E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ A9A1 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ A9A3              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ A9A3 CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ A9A5              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ A9A5 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ A9A7 DA B4 A9    >                        jp		c, TIS1SkipSub
  54+ A9AA DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ A9AC 37           		scf
  56+ A9AD CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ A9AF 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ A9B1              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ A9B1 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ A9B2 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ A9B3 C9           		ret
  62+ A9B4              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ A9B4 B7           	or			a
  64+ A9B5 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ A9B7 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ A9B9 C3 B1 A9     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ A9BC
  68+ A9BC              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ A9BC              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ A9BC
  71+ A9BC
  72+ A9BC
  73+ A9BC
  74+ A9BC              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ A9BC CD E7 AA     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ A9BF 32 20 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ A9C2 C3 F8 A9     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ A9C5
  79+ A9C5              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ A9C5 AF           		xor		a
  81+ A9C6 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ A9C7 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ A9CA E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ A9CC CA BC A9     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ A9CF 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ A9D2 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ A9D3 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ A9D6 CD AD AA     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ A9D9 32 1E C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ A9DC C3 F8 A9     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ A9DF              ; TIDY is broken
  92+ A9DF              TIDY:
  93+ A9DF DD 01                break
  94+ A9E1              ORTHOGALISE:
  95+ A9E1              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  96+ A9E1 CD 1D A9     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  97+ A9E4 CD 0E A5     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi, its really TIS3
  98+ A9E7 CD 56 A9     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  99+ A9EA              .CheckNXSmall:
 100+ A9EA 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 101+ A9ED E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 102+ A9EF CA C5 A9     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 103+ A9F2              .RotXIsBig:
 104+ A9F2 CD 73 AA             call	CalcRoofvX
 105+ A9F5 32 1C C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 106+ A9F8              NormaliseRoofV:
 107+ A9F8 CD 30 A9     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 108+ A9FB CD 0E A5     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 109+ A9FE              ;calc sidev x
 110+ A9FE CD 69 A9     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 111+ AA01 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 112+ AA04 32 AA 93     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 113+ AA07 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 114+ AA0A CD 0F A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 115+ AA0D 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 116+ AA10 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 117+ AA11 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 118+ AA14 CD 8F A9     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 119+ AA17                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideXNoNeg
 119+ AA17 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 119+ AA18 CA 1D AA    >				jp	z, NormSideXNoNeg
 120+ AA1B EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 121+ AA1D              NormSideXNoNeg:
 122+ AA1D 32 16 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 123+ AA20              ;calc sidev y
 124+ AA20 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 125+ AA23 32 AA 93     		ld		(varQ),a
 126+ AA26 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 127+ AA29 CD 0F A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 128+ AA2C 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 129+ AA2F 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 130+ AA30 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 131+ AA33 CD 8F A9     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 132+ AA36                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideYNoNeg
 132+ AA36 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 132+ AA37 CA 3C AA    >				jp	z, NormSideYNoNeg
 133+ AA3A EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 134+ AA3C              NormSideYNoNeg:
 135+ AA3C 32 24 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 136+ AA3F              ;calc sidev z
 137+ AA3F 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 138+ AA42 32 AA 93     		ld		(varQ),a
 139+ AA45 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 140+ AA48 CD 0F A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 141+ AA4B 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 142+ AA4E 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 143+ AA4F 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 144+ AA52 CD 8F A9     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 145+ AA55                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideZNoNeg
 145+ AA55 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 145+ AA56 CA 5B AA    >				jp	z, NormSideZNoNeg
 146+ AA59 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 147+ AA5B              NormSideZNoNeg:
 148+ AA5B 32 18 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 149+ AA5E              .ClearLoBytes:
 150+ AA5E 21 21 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 151+ AA61 06 09        		ld		b,9
 152+ AA63 AF                   xor     a
 153+ AA64              .ClearLoLoop:
 154+ AA64 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 155+ AA65 23           		inc		hl
 156+ AA66 23           		inc		hl
 157+ AA67 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 158+ AA69 CD 43 A9     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 159+ AA6C CD 0E A5     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 160+ AA6F              ;calc sidev x
 161+ AA6F CD 7C A9     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 162+ AA72
 163+ AA72 C9           		ret
 164+ AA73
 165+ AA73
 166+ AA73
 167+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 168+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 169+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 170+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 171+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 172+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 173+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 174+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 175+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 176+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 177+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 178+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 179+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 180+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 181+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 182+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 183+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 184+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 185+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 186+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 187+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 188+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 189+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 190+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 191+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 192+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 193+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 194+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 195+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 196+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 197+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 198+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 199+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 200+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 201+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 202+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 203+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 204+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 205+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 206+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 207+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 208+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 209+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 210+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 211+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 212+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 213+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 214+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 215+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 216+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 217+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 218+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 219+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 220+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 221+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 222+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 223+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 224+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 225+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 226+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 227+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 228+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 229+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 230+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 231+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 232+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 233+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 234+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 235+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 236+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 237+ AA73              ;;;;;;;;
 238+ AA73
 239+ AA73
 240+ AA73              CalcRoofvX:
 241+ AA73              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 242+ AA73              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 242+ AA73 3A 26 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 242+ AA76 32 AA 93    >               ld       (varQ),a
 243+ AA79 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 244+ AA7C CD 0F A9     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 245+ AA7F              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 245+ AA7F 3A 24 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 245+ AA82 32 AA 93    >               ld       (varQ),a
 246+ AA85 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 247+ AA88 CD 47 A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 248+ AA8B 7A           		ld		a,d
 249+ AA8C E6 80        		and 	$80
 250+ AA8E FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 251+ AA90              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 252+ AA90 3A 22 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 253+ AA93 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 254+ AA94 E6 80        		and		$80
 255+ AA96 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 256+ AA98 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 257+ AA9A 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 258+ AA9B E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 259+ AA9D 42           		ld		b,d
 260+ AA9E 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 261+ AA9F 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 262+ AAA0 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 263+ AAA2 CD 80 A3     		call	BC_Div_DE
 264+ AAA5 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 265+ AAA7 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 266+ AAA9 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 267+ AAAB B0           		or		b
 268+ AAAC C9           		ret
 269+ AAAD
 270+ AAAD
 271+ AAAD              CalcRoofvY:
 272+ AAAD              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 273+ AAAD              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 273+ AAAD 3A 26 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 273+ AAB0 32 AA 93    >               ld       (varQ),a
 274+ AAB3 3A 20 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 275+ AAB6 CD 0F A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 276+ AAB9              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 276+ AAB9 3A 22 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 276+ AABC 32 AA 93    >               ld       (varQ),a
 277+ AABF 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 278+ AAC2 CD 47 A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 279+ AAC5 7A           		ld		a,d
 280+ AAC6 E6 80        		and 	$80
 281+ AAC8 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 282+ AACA 3A 24 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 283+ AACD 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 284+ AACE E6 80        		and		$80
 285+ AAD0 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 286+ AAD2 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 287+ AAD4 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 288+ AAD5 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 289+ AAD7 42           		ld		b,d
 290+ AAD8 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 291+ AAD9 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 292+ AADA 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 293+ AADC CD 80 A3     		call	BC_Div_DE
 294+ AADF FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 295+ AAE1 EE 80        		xor		$80
 296+ AAE3 E6 80        		and		$80
 297+ AAE5 B0           		or		b
 298+ AAE6 C9           		ret
 299+ AAE7
 300+ AAE7              CalcRoofvZ:
 301+ AAE7              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 302+ AAE7              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 302+ AAE7 3A 24 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 302+ AAEA 32 AA 93    >               ld       (varQ),a
 303+ AAED 3A 1E C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 304+ AAF0 CD 0F A9     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 305+ AAF3              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 305+ AAF3 3A 22 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 305+ AAF6 32 AA 93    >               ld       (varQ),a
 306+ AAF9 3A 1C C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 307+ AAFC CD 47 A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 308+ AAFF 7A           		ld		a,d
 309+ AB00 E6 80        		and 	$80
 310+ AB02 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 311+ AB04 3A 26 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 312+ AB07 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 313+ AB08 E6 80        		and		$80
 314+ AB0A FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 315+ AB0C FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 316+ AB0E 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 317+ AB0F E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 318+ AB11 42           		ld		b,d
 319+ AB12 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 320+ AB13 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 321+ AB14 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 322+ AB16 CD 80 A3     		call	BC_Div_DE
 323+ AB19 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 324+ AB1B EE 80        		xor		$80
 325+ AB1D E6 80        		and		$80
 326+ AB1F B0           		or		b
 327+ AB20 C9           		ret
 328+ AB21
 329+ AB21
 330+ AB21
 331+ AB21              ;;ProcessSidev:
 332+ AB21              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 333+ AB21              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 334+ AB21              ;;		push	bc
 335+ AB21              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 336+ AB21              ;;		pop		bc
 337+ AB21              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 338+ AB21              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 339+ AB21              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 340+ AB21              ;;		push	bc
 341+ AB21              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 342+ AB21              ;;		pop		bc
 343+ AB21              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 344+ AB21              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 345+ AB21              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 346+ AB21              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 347+ AB21              ;;		push	bc
 348+ AB21              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 349+ AB21              ;;		pop		bc
 350+ AB21              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 351+ AB21              ;;		ld		b,a
 352+ AB21              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 353+ AB21              ;;		push	bc
 354+ AB21              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 355+ AB21              ;;		pop		bc
 356+ AB21              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 357+ AB21              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 358+ AB21              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 359+ AB21              ;;		push	bc
 360+ AB21              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 361+ AB21              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 362+ AB21              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 363+ AB21              ;;		pop		bc
 364+ AB21              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 365+ AB21              ;;		ld		b,a
 366+ AB21              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 367+ AB21              ;;		push	bc
 368+ AB21              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 369+ AB21              ;;		pop		bc
 370+ AB21              ;;		xor		$80
 371+ AB21              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 372+ AB21              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 373+ AB21              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 374+ AB21              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 375+ AB21              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 376+ AB21
 377+ AB21
 378+ AB21
 379+ AB21
 380+ AB21
 381+ AB21
 382+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 383+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 384+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 385+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 386+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 387+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 388+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 389+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:
 390+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 391+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 392+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 393+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 394+ AB21              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version

# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
 910  AB21                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ AB21
   2+ AB21              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ AB21 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ AB22 D2 40 AB    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ AB25 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ AB27 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ AB29 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ AB2B                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ AB2B BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ AB2C DA 31 AB    >                        jp		c, .SkipSub
   7+ AB2F 92                                   sub     d
   8+ AB30                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ AB30 B7          >                    or a
   9+ AB31 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ AB32 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ AB34 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ AB36 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ AB37 C9                                   ret
  14+ AB38 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ AB39 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ AB3A CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ AB3C 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ AB3E 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ AB3F C9                                   ret
  20+ AB40 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ AB42 C9                                   ret
  22+ AB43
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
 911  AB43                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ AB43              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ AB43              TIS1:
   3+ AB43 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ AB44 3A 39 93     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ AB47 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ AB48 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ AB49              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ AB49 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ AB4A 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ AB4B 32 AA 93     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ AB4E 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ AB4F EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ AB51 CD 47 A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ AB54              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ AB54              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ AB54              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ AB54 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ AB55 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ AB57 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ AB58 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ AB59 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ AB5B 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ AB5D 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ AB5E              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ AB5E CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ AB60 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ AB62 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ AB64 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ AB66              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ AB66 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ AB68 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ AB6A 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ AB6B B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ AB6C C9           		ret
  35+ AB6D
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
